MsgJp: 身の証を立ててから出直してくるんだね
MsgEn: Come back after proving your worth.

MsgJp:
別の国の覚者――
何だ、話聞く
MsgEn:
Arisen from another country...
Well, what's the story?

MsgJp:
安全守るの、手間かかってる
泊まるなら<VAL PRICE_INN>いる
MsgEn:
Protecting safety is time-consuming.
If you stay, it will cost <VAL PRICE_INN>.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
金、いらない
安全な寝床、好きに休んでいけ
MsgEn:
Gold, I don't need it.
A safe sleeping place, rest as you please.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
俺《弱化の治療》できる
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>だ
MsgEn:
If it's "Treat Weakness", it's <VAL PRICE_WEAK>.
What do you want to do?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
弱化――？
なってない
気にしすぎだ
MsgEn:
Weakened――?
Not at all.
You're worrying too much.

MsgJp:
お前、珍しい客だ
皆、お前が気になってる
MsgEn:
You're a rare customer.
Everyone is curious about you.

MsgJp:
皆が安全に眠れる
毎日食べられる
何かに襲われない――
これが大事、一番大事だ
MsgEn:
Everyone being able to sleep safely, being able
to eat every day, not being attacked by anything――
This is important, the most important thing.

MsgJp:
外に出ると魔物に襲われる
争いに巻き込まれる
病気にもなる――
なら、ここで仲間を守っていきたい
MsgEn:
When you go outside, you will be attacked by
enemies.
You will be drawn into conflicts.
You can even fall ill--
So, I want to protect my comrades here.

MsgJp:
お前も、大人しくしてるなら
ここにずっと居ていい
好きにしろ
MsgEn:
If you're staying here quietly, you can stay here
as long as you like.
Do as you please.

MsgJp:
オレ、コレ調べてる！
使い方ワカル！　仲間呼ぶなら手伝う！
MsgEn:
I'm researching this!
I understand how to use it! If you call your
comrades, I'll help!

MsgJp:
コレ青く光る――
キレイだろ？
MsgEn:
This shines blue—
Isn't it beautiful?

MsgJp:
コレ、昔からココにある
ずっとずっと前からある
MsgEn: This has been here since long, long ago.

MsgJp:
オレ、一番コレに詳しい
分からないなら教える
MsgEn:
I'm the most knowledgeable about this.
If you don't know, I'll teach you.

MsgJp:
ナニ？
資材欲しい？
MsgEn:
What?
Do you want materials?

MsgJp:
資材、ゴールドと引き換え
ゴールド持ってるか？
MsgEn:
Do you have any Gold?
We can exchange it for materials.

MsgJp:
ゴールド集める
資材買える
――わかった？
MsgEn:
Collect Gold.
Buy Materials.
- Got it?

MsgJp:
ゴールドない？
なら、お前に資材ない
MsgEn:
Don't you have any Gold?
If not, then you don't have any materials either.

MsgJp: ム、何の用ダ！
MsgEn: Hmm, what's your business!

MsgJp: ココ、魔物来ないか見張ってる
MsgEn: I am keeping watch here, in case enemies appear.

MsgJp:
お前――魔物連れて来てないな？
後つけられたら、困ることなる
MsgEn:
You... haven't brought any enemies, have you?
If you bring them later, it will become
troublesome.

MsgJp:
見張ってないと、村、襲われる
――オレ忙しいだが、オマエひまなのか？
MsgEn:
If we don't keep watch, the village will be
attacked.
- I'm busy, but are you free?

MsgJp: えっと、あの、ナニ？
MsgEn: Um, uh, what?

MsgJp:
ココ、安心ヨ
眠れる、食べれる、怖いことナイ――
MsgEn:
Here, you can rest easy.
You can sleep, eat, and there's nothing to fear.

MsgJp:
ちゃんと幸せヨ
外出ようと思ワナイ
MsgEn:
I want to be truly happy.
I don't want to go out.

MsgJp: え、あの――外は怖いカラ――
MsgEn: Um, well— it's scary outside—

MsgJp: ハーイ、ナニ？
MsgEn: Hello, what's up?

MsgJp:
ネェネェ、手伝って！
クエストボードに
ミンナの“お願い”貼ってるダカラ！
MsgEn:
Hey, hey, can you help me out?
I've posted everyone's "requests" on the Quest
Board, you see!

MsgJp:
クエストボードの“お願い”やっつけてくれたら
お礼もあるヨー！
MsgEn:
If you can help me with the "requests" on the
Quest Board, there will be a reward too!

MsgJp:
クエストボードの“お願い”やっつけて減らす
でもまた“お願い”増える――
ダカラ、ミンナでやっつけよ！
MsgEn:
Complete the requests on the quest board and
whittle them down.
But then, more requests keep coming— So let's all
take care of them together!

MsgJp:
おお、お客人
ワシに何か聞きたいことでも？
MsgEn:
Oh, esteemed customer.
Is there something you would like to ask me?

MsgJp:
ワシは若い頃、一度この集落から出て
他の集落を旅して回ったことがありましてな
MsgEn:
When I was young, I once left this village and
traveled to other villages.

MsgJp:
外はどうだったか、ですか？
こうしてまたこの集落に戻り、この歳に
なるまで過ごしているのです
――もう、お分かりでしょう
MsgEn:
How was it outside, you ask?
Well, I returned to this settlement, and I've
been here until this age.
— You probably understand by now.

MsgJp:
この集落の者は他所と少し言葉が違うでしょう
交流が無いまま過ごすとね
こうなるんですよ
MsgEn:
The people in this settlement might have slightly
different language compared to others.
When you spend your time without much
interaction, this is what happens.

MsgJp:
フィンダム全体で見ても
ワシは年寄りの部類ですわな
この洞窟が外部の災厄から守ってくれるお陰です
MsgEn:
Even in the whole Phindym, I suppose I belong to
the old folks category.
Thanks to this cave, it protects us from external
calamities.

MsgJp:
ようこそ、異国の覚者様
モルフォールにご用でしょうか？
MsgEn:
Welcome, esteemed Arisen.
Are you in need of assistance in Morfaul?

MsgJp:
かつて村を支えてくれていた大地が
突然我々に牙をむくというのは――
頭ではわかっていても、悲しさを覚えるものです
MsgEn:
The fact that the land, which once supported our
village, suddenly shows its fangs towards us...
Even though we understand it in our heads, it
brings forth a sense of sadness.

MsgJp:
この村はまたも危機にさらされています
――異国の覚者様
再三で申し訳なく思う気持ちはあります
しかし、お力を貸していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
This village is once again facing a crisis.
――Lord of a foreign land, I apologize for the
repeated inconvenience...
Would you lend us your power?

MsgJp:
ご協力いただける時に
また私にお声をかけていただければ
詳細を知る者にお取り次ぎいたします
MsgEn:
When you are able to assist, please also reach
out to me and I will relay the details to someone
who can provide more information.

MsgJp:
おや、ここモルフォールの族長はガラダですよ
私は彼の信を得て、この地域を
切り盛りしているだけです
MsgEn:
Oh, here in Morfaul, the chieftain is Gearóid.
I just manage this area with his trust.

MsgJp:
モルフォールは代々精霊竜の
守りをしてきた一族の村です
MsgEn:
Morfaul is the village of a clan that has been
protecting the Spirit Dragons for generations.

MsgJp:
精霊竜の守番となったものは、ここから東に行った
《始まりの洞》にて過ごすことになります
村に残った者は彼らを全力で支えるのが務めです
MsgEn:
Those who become guardians of the Spirit Dragon
will spend their time in the Hollow of Beginnings,
located to the east from here.
Those who stay in the village have the duty to
support them with all their might.

MsgJp:
侵食がはびこるこのような状況ですから
族長ガラダの補佐として
モードレッドが就いています
MsgEn:
Given the prevalence of corruption in this
situation, Mordred has taken on the role of
assisting Chief Gearóid.

MsgJp:
彼も最初は精霊竜の守番として
竜のお傍にて務めるはずだったのですよ
MsgEn:
He was also supposed to serve as the guardian of
the Spirit Dragon at first, by its side.

MsgJp:
はじめまして、私はアルトフェイル
このモロー樹林一帯を任されたエリアマスターです
MsgEn:
Nice to meet you, I am Arthfael, the Area Master
entrusted with this entire Morrow Forest.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林はその呼び名の通り
フィンダム大陸の中でも深き森を
数多く有しています
MsgEn:
The Morrow Forest, as its name suggests, is one
of the deep forests found in the continent of
Phindym.

MsgJp:
森の恩恵を受け、これまでは恵まれた
環境であったと言えるでしょう
そう、“侵食”が始まる前までは――
MsgEn:
Thanks to the blessings of the forest, it can be
said that we have been fortunate to exist in a
favorable environment.
Yes, until the "corruption" began to spread...

MsgJp:
現在は村の総力を挙げて
侵食の被害を食い止めるため尽力しています
ここで我々が屈することは、フィンダムが
屈することに等しいと考えています――
MsgEn:
Currently, we are making every effort with the
combined strength of the village to halt the
spread of Corruption.
We believe that surrendering at this point would
be tantamount to Phindym's surrender.

MsgJp:
聞けば、覚者様たちは
セシリーを助けてくださっているとか――
彼女はこの村の出身なのですよ
同胞として感謝いたします
MsgEn:
I've heard that you, as Arisen, are helping Lady
Cecily— She is from this village, you know.
We are grateful for your assistance as fellow
villagers.

MsgJp:
このモルフォールに滞在されている間
何かわからないことがあれば
気がねなく私にお聞きください
MsgEn:
During your stay in Morfaul, if there is anything
you don't understand, please feel free to ask me.

MsgJp:
そうそう、こちらをお持ちください
モルフォールの平穏に貢献してくださった方に
お渡ししているのです
MsgEn:
That's right. Please take this with you.
We give it to those who have contributed to the
peace of Morfaul.

MsgJp:
立ち寄ってくださってありがとうございます
よろしければこちらをお持ちください
日々の感謝の気持ちです
MsgEn:
Thank you for stopping by.
If you don't mind, please take this.
It's a daily expression of gratitude.

MsgJp:
異なる竜に仕える身だというのに
このモルフォールのために日々尽力してくださり
ここを代表して感謝いたします
どうぞ、これをお役立てください
MsgEn:
Even though I am serving a different dragon, I am
grateful for your daily efforts for Morfaul.
Please accept this, and may it be of use to you.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者様
実は折り入ってお願いがございます――
MsgEn:
Arisen of the White Dragon, I have a favor to
ask, if I may...

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 907>》の付近、森の南側に
侵食が拡がっていないかを
調査していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Could you please investigate if there is no
spreading of corruption or infected near the
vicinity of《<SPOT 907>》, on the south side of the
forest?

MsgJp:
もしも侵食が拡がっている形跡が認められれば
それらを排除してくださると幸いです
MsgEn:
If there are any signs of the corruption
spreading, I would be grateful if you could
eliminate them.

MsgJp:
元より《<SPOT 907>》は侵食魔が潜むため
一時立ち入りを禁じていたのですが
どうやら出入り口を塞げばよいというものでも
なさそうなのです
MsgEn:
Because the area around <SPOT 907> is infested
with the Corruption, entry was temporarily
prohibited.
However, it seems that simply blocking the
entrance is not a viable solution.

MsgJp:
この侵食という災いに対し
有効な対策を立てられていないというのは
実に不甲斐ないことです
MsgEn:
It is truly disgraceful that we have not been
able to come up with effective measures against
this calamity of corruption.

MsgJp:
侵食について――
事態は悪くなる一方ですね
MsgEn:
About the corruption—
The situation is only getting worse, isn't it?

MsgJp:
先日も、森へ入った者より
侵食魔が群れているところを見たと
報告が入ってきました――
MsgEn:
We have received a report from someone who
recently entered the forest, saying that they saw
a swarm of Infected creatures.

MsgJp:
森へ入ってその恵みを得ることが
できなくなってしまえば
我々の生活は苦しいものとなるでしょう
MsgEn:
If we are unable to enter the forest and obtain
its blessings, our lives will surely become
difficult.

MsgJp:
――森に入った者からの報告を
お聞きになりたいのですか？
ええ、いつでもお話しいたしますよ
私に再び声をおかけください
MsgEn:
- you want to hear the reports from those who
entered the forest?
Yes, I'll be ready to talk whenever. Please call
on me again.

MsgJp:
やはり、侵食に対して“封鎖する”という手段は
気休め程度にしかならないようですね――
MsgEn:
Indeed, "blocking" locations as a means to
counter corruption seems to be nothing more than a
mere illusion.

MsgJp:
封鎖した《<SPOT 906>》から
魔物が這い出てきているようなのです
どこかに抜け道でもあるのでしょう
MsgEn:
It seems that enemies are crawling out from the
blocked spot <SPOT 906>. There must be some kind
of escape route somewhere.

MsgJp:
このまま封鎖し続けても後はありません
《<SPOT 906>》も調査の対象とできるよう
封鎖を解除いたしました
MsgEn:
There is no future if we continue to keep it
blocked like this.
In order to include 《<SPOT 906>》 in the
investigation, we have released the blockade.

MsgJp:
覚者様も、もしよろしければ
一度現状を確認していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Ser Arisen, if you wouldn't mind, could you
please take a moment to review the current
situation?

MsgJp:
侵食についての調査進捗ですか？
――芳しいとはいえませんね
MsgEn:
Is this regarding the progress of the
investigation on corruption?
- It's not going well, I'm afraid.

MsgJp:
やはり、侵食に対しては封鎖して時が過ぎるのを
待つという手は愚策となるようです
MsgEn:
Indeed, it seems that blocking and waiting for
time to pass is a foolish strategy when it comes
to corruption.

MsgJp:
大地が侵食されている以上
侵食のひどいところを封鎖しても
いずれ侵食は他のところに拡がってしまいます
MsgEn:
As long as the earth is being corrupted even if
we block the heavily infected areas the corruption
will eventually spread to other places.

MsgJp:
ここは《モルフォール北門》をも開放し
侵食への対策法を探ってゆこうと考えています
MsgEn:
Here; we also plan to open the "Morfaul Northern
Gate" and explore ways to counter the Infected.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者様
異なる大陸の方にこのようなお願いをするのは
心苦しいのですが――どうか、この難局への
お力添えをいただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Arisen of the White Dragon,
It pains my heart to make such a request to
someone from a different continent, but could you
please lend us your aid in this dire situation?
We humbly ask for your assistance in overcoming
this adversity.

MsgJp:
覚者様――
人間も侵食される、という話を
お聞きになったことはあるでしょうか
MsgEn:
Oh, honorable Arisen, have you ever heard the
tale of humans being corrupted?

MsgJp:
侵食された人々によって
このモルフォールが危機に晒されているのです
MsgEn:
Morfaul is being exposed to danger by the
infected people who have been corrupted.

MsgJp:
あまり大きな声では申し上げられません
詳しくは、もう一度私に話しかけてください
MsgEn:
I have to speak quietly about this.
Please talk to me again for more details.

MsgJp:
この未曾有の危機はフィンダム全体に
降りかかっているとはいえ――
大変なことというのは重なるものですね
MsgEn:
Yes, even though this unprecedented crisis is
weighing down on all of Phindym... it seems that
difficult times tend to pile up, don't they?

MsgJp:
村全体の落ち着かない空気を察したのか
《<SPOT 942>》に
狂侵ゴアサイクロプスが現れたのです
MsgEn:
Perhaps sensing the unsettled atmosphere of the
entire village, a Severely Infected Gorecyclops
appeared at <<SPOT 942>>.

MsgJp:
狂侵ゴアサイクロプスは、侵食の犠牲となった
ゴアサイクロプスの成れの果て――
肉体が朽ちる前にさらに侵食が進んでしまった
非常に凶悪な魔物です
MsgEn:
The Severely Infected Gorecyclops is the tragic
result of the corruption, the ultimate fate of a
Gore Cyclops.
The corruption has progressed even further before
its body decayed, making it an extremely vicious
creature.

MsgJp:
装備に不安がある状態で遭遇した際には
逃げることも必要となりましょう
常に冷静なご判断を――
MsgEn:
When faced with a situation where there is
uncertainty about your equipment, it is also
necessary to consider retreating.
Always make calm judgments—

MsgJp:
フィンダム中でも特に侵食の進んだ
このモロー樹林に、絶えず足を運んでくださり
感謝の気持ちしかありません
MsgEn:
Among the lands of Phindym, the Morrow Forest has
been particularly ravaged by the Infected.
I have nothing but gratitude for those who
constantly venture into this heavily corrupted
forest.

MsgJp:
日々のお礼として、この辺りで
役にたちそうな情報をお教えいたしましょう
MsgEn:
As a daily expression of gratitude, allow me to
provide you with some useful information in this
area.

MsgJp:
ここモロー樹林では
《ヘンルーダ》というハーブが採れるのです
小さな花を付ける、一見地味なハーブですので
草花を採取される際には少し注意してご覧ください
MsgEn:
In Morrow Forest here, you can find a herb called
"Wijnruit".
It's a seemingly plain herb that bears small
flowers.
When collecting herbs, please be wary and handle
with caution.

MsgJp:
《ヘンルーダ》は爽やかな香りで
虫を寄せ付けないという効果を持っています
魔物相手にその効果は無いでしょうが――
きっと覚者様のお役に立つことと思いますよ
MsgEn:
"Wijnruit" has a refreshing fragrance that repels
insects.
Its effects may not work against monsters, but
I'm sure it will be helpful to you, Arisen.

MsgJp:
覚者様のお力添えがあるおかげで
モルフォールも何とか持ちこたえられています
MsgEn:
Thanks to the assistance of esteemed Arisen like
yourself, Morfaul has managed to hold on somehow.

MsgJp:
この村を、村人の日々を守ってくださって
ありがとうございます――
MsgEn:
Thank you for protecting this village and its
villagers day by day.

MsgJp:
覚者様により良い支援品をお届けできるよう
村の者で力を合わせて手配しております
これからも、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします
MsgEn:
To provide better support goods for esteemed
Arisen, the villagers are joining forces to make
arrangements.
We humbly ask for your continued support.
Thank you very much.

MsgJp:
覚者様がこの辺りの魔物討伐を進めて
くださったおかげで、奥地へ続く道を埋めていた
がれきを撤去することが叶いました
MsgEn:
Thanks to the efforts of the esteemed Arisen in
defeating the nearby enemies, we were able to
remove the debris that was blocking the path to
the deeper regions.

MsgJp:
今回の整備によって
《<SPOT 909>》へ足を踏み入れることが
できるようになっています、が――
MsgEn:
Thanks to this maintenance, you will now be able
to set foot into 《<SPOT 909>》, but...

MsgJp:
かの地はこのモルフォール一帯においても
特に侵食の進んだ森のひとつ
MsgEn:
That area is one of the forests in this entire
Morfaul region that has been particularly ravaged
by corruption.

MsgJp:
調査に行かれるときには
くれぐれも装備を揃え、細心の注意を――
MsgEn:
When going on a survey, please make sure to
prepare your equipment properly and pay close
attention--

MsgJp:
侵食の勢いはますます増すばかり――
先日は、村周辺の巡回に出た若者が
妙なものを見たと報告がありました
MsgEn:
The momentum of corruption only continues to
grow--
Recently, a young adventurer who was patrolling
the village noticed something strange and reported
it.

MsgJp:
なんでも爆発のようなものと、侵食胞子が
大量に巻き上がるのを見た――というのです
MsgEn:
I heard that they witnessed something like a
massive explosion, and an abundance of corroding
spores swirling around.

MsgJp:
すぐにでも調査に向かいたいところなのですが
新手の侵食魔が出現しており
危険度の高さから人が近寄ることを
制限せざるをえません
MsgEn:
I would love to head to the investigation
immediately, but there is a new type of
corruption-infected monster appearing, and due to
its high level of danger, we have no choice but to
restrict people from approaching.

MsgJp:
覚者様、どうか危険度の高い
新手の侵食魔を排除していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Ser Arisen, could you please eliminate the highly
dangerous new infected enemies?

MsgJp:
我が村には戦える人員が少なく
覚者様のお力添えなくては
調査に向かうことができないのです――
MsgEn:
In our village, we have a shortage of capable
personnel to fight.
We cannot proceed with the investigation without
the assistance of the Arisen's power.

MsgJp:
討伐に向かっていただけるのならば
再度私にお声をかけてください
今回の件を取りまとめている者に
取り次がせていただきます
MsgEn:
If you are willing to head out for the
subjugation, please reach out to me again.
I will relay your voice to the person in charge
of handling this matter.

MsgJp:
覚者様、この度
崖崩れのあった《<SPOT 944>》付近を
復旧することに成功いたしました
MsgEn:
Dear Arisen, We have successfully restored the
area near "<SPOT 944>" where the cliff collapsed.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 910>》に入れるようになったので
早速、調査のために
何人か人を向かわせたのですが――
MsgEn:
We've gained access to <SPOT 910> now, and we
immediately sent a few people there for
investigation, but—

MsgJp:
なにやら、大地に大穴が――
クレーターというのでしょうか
そういったものができているとの
報告があったのです
MsgEn:
It seems there's a massive hole in the ground— a
crater, you might call it.
We received reports that such a thing has formed.

MsgJp:
一体何が起こっているのか
見当もつきませんが――
MsgEn: I have no idea what's going on, but...

MsgJp:
覚者様も、よろしければ
一度調査に向かってくださるよう
お願いいたします
MsgEn:
If you are willing, Arisen, we would appreciate
it if you could head there for an investigation
when you have the time.

MsgJp:
ああ、白き竜の覚者様――
今一度、お力をお貸しいただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Ah, esteemed Arisen of the white dragon.
Could you lend me your power once again, if you
please?

MsgJp:
先日見つかった謎のクレーター
その正体が判明したのです
MsgEn:
The mysterious crater that was discovered the
other day...
Its true identity has been revealed.

MsgJp:
この願いを聞いていただけるのであれば
再び私に話しかけてください
――どうか、お願いいたします
MsgEn:
If you are willing to grant this request, please
speak to me again.
— Please, we beseech you.

MsgJp:
今日もこのモルフォールに足を運んでくださり
ありがとうございます
MsgEn: Thank you for visiting Morfaul once again today.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者様
あなたのお力でモルフォールは
侵食の拡大を食い止めることができました
MsgEn:
Lord of the White Dragon,
With your power, we were able to halt the spread
of corruption by Morfaul.

MsgJp:
これからも、フィンダムにいらした際には
ぜひモルフォールにお立ち寄りください
MsgEn:
When you come to Phindym in the future, please
make sure to stop by Morfaul.

MsgJp:
より良い支援品もご用意して
いつでもお待ちしております
MsgEn:
We also have better support goods prepared for
you.
We are always ready to assist you.

MsgJp:
自分の故郷にあなたが足を運んでくだされば
きっとセシリーも喜ぶことでしょう
MsgEn:
If you would come visit my hometown, Cecily would
surely rejoice.

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》の効能に懐疑的な者もいます
しかし、今、他に何を信じれば良いというのでしょう
MsgEn:
There are also those who are skeptical of the
effects of "Primeval Drops".
However, what else should we believe in now?

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
どうか、我々とともに歩んでください
MsgEn: Arisen of Lestania, please, walk with us.

MsgJp:
フィンダムに生きる我々は“さだめ”に忠実でした
大いなる流れに逆らって、一時、生きのびても
なんになるというのか――
MsgEn:
We, who live in Phindym, remained faithful to
"destiny"
Even if it meant going against the great current
and surviving temporarily, what would we become――

MsgJp:
こんな考え方の犠牲者が大勢いたのは事実
周囲の諦めが殺してしまった者も多い――
それは認めねばなりません
MsgEn:
It is a fact that there were many victims of such
a way of thinking.
Many were killed by the resignation of those
around them -
That must be acknowledged.

MsgJp:
ロイグの乱心――黒い騎士の暗躍――
両方ともフィンダムに生きる我々の
気風が招いた凶事ということでしょうか
MsgEn:
Loeg's Madness - The Dark Machinations of the
Black Knight.
Both of these unfortunate events have been
brought upon us, who live in Phindym, by our own
way of life, wouldn't you say?

MsgJp: 何かご用かな？
MsgEn: Hello, do you need anything?

MsgJp:
戦技というものは奥が深い
常に学ばせていただく身だよ
MsgEn:
The art of warfare is profound.
I am always a student, constantly learning.

MsgJp:
宿泊だったら<VAL PRICE_INN>だよ
ハーブで編んだ特製の寝床を
用意してあるけど、どうかな？
MsgEn:
If it's lodging, it'll be <VAL PRICE_INN>.
I have prepared a specially woven bed made of
herbs, how about it?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
ハーブの香りを楽しめる寝床を用意してある
疲れていたら泊まっていくといいよ
MsgEn:
We have prepared a sleeping area where you can
enjoy the scent of herbs.
If you're tired, feel free to stay overnight.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
ふむ――この《弱化の治療》には
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>かかりそうだ
いいかな？
MsgEn:
Hmm... for this "Treat Weakness", it seems like
it will cost <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. Is that alright?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
おや、弱化していないようだね
元気で何よりだ
MsgEn:
Oh, it seems you haven't weakened, huh?
Being healthy is the most important thing after
all.

MsgJp:
おや、何か必要なものがあるのか？
ここにあるといいんだが――
MsgEn:
Oh, is there something you need?
It would be great if it's something that's here...

MsgJp:
討伐に行くにしろ、採取を楽しむにしろ
出発前の準備は大切だ
その時々に必要なものを選別することだ
MsgEn:
Whether you're going on a quest or simply
enjoying gathering, preparation before departure
is crucial.
It's important to select the necessary items for
each occasion.

MsgJp:
ここ、モルフォール付近の森では
質の良いハーブがよく採れる
我々はそれを生活に役立てているんだ
MsgEn:
Here, in the forest near Morfaul, we often find
high-quality herbs.
We make good use of them in our daily lives.

MsgJp:
採取が目当ての場合でも
回復薬は多めに持っておくんだ
森では何が起こるかわからないぞ
MsgEn:
Even if your purpose is exploration, make sure to
carry plenty of recovery potions.
You never know what could happen in the forest.

MsgJp:
ハァイ、旅の仲間を集めたいの？
私がお手伝いできると思うわ
MsgEn:
Hello, do you want to gather fellow travelers?
I think I can help you with that.

MsgJp:
森へ行くのね
気を付けていってらっしゃい！
MsgEn:
You're going to the forest, huh?
Take care and have a safe journey!

MsgJp:
森の情報はアルトフェイルに聞いてみて
私たちも、何かあれば
まずアルトフェイルに報告してるから
MsgEn:
If you want information about the forest, ask
Arthfael.
We always report to Arthfael first if anything
happens.

MsgJp:
森には危険も多いけど
美味しい木の実なんかの恵みも豊富なの！
――今は侵食っていう問題があるけど
MsgEn:
In the forest, there are many dangers, but there
is also an abundance of blessings, like delicious
nuts and fruits!
- Although now there is a problem of corruption.

MsgJp: ん？　何か？
MsgEn: Hmm? Something wrong?

MsgJp:
村には家畜も作物もあるから
隙あらばと狙っている魔物もたくさんいるんだ
だからこうして見張っているのさ
MsgEn:
Because there are both livestock and crops in the
village, there are also many monsters lurking,
waiting for an opportunity.
That's why we are keeping watch like this.

MsgJp:
他の村ではどうか知らないけど
この村では、子供を一人で
村の外に出さない決まりがあるんだ
魔物に狙われたらコトだからね
MsgEn:
I don't know about other villages, but in this
village, there is a rule not to let children go
outside alone.
It's to protect them from being targeted by
enemies.

MsgJp:
僕も子供に同行を頼まれた時には
最優先で引き受けるようにしているよ
MsgEn:
When I'm asked to accompany a child, I always
make it a top priority to accept.

MsgJp:
君は中々の実力を持っていそうだけど――
森に入るなら、友か従者を呼んだ方がいいよ
MsgEn:
You seem to have quite a bit of skill, but if
you're going into the forest, it would be wise to
bring a friend or a servant.

MsgJp: お、畑をいじりながらでもよいかな？
MsgEn:
Oh, can I tinker with the field even while doing
it?

MsgJp: 手間ひまかけるほど、野菜は美味くなるからの――
MsgEn:
The more effort you put into it, the more
delicious the vegetables become.

MsgJp:
こうして大地の恵みを楽しめるのも
精霊竜様あってのこと――
はやく“侵食”が収まればいいんじゃが――
MsgEn:
It's all thanks to the Spirit Dragon that we can
enjoy the blessings of the earth.
I hope the "Corruption" subsides soon.

MsgJp:
おっと、あの辺りは踏まないようにしてくれ
ようやく芽が出始めたところなんじゃ
MsgEn:
Oh, please be careful not to step on that area.
It looks like the buds are finally starting to
sprout.

MsgJp:
実はな、若い頃は精霊竜様のお傍で
守番として仕事をしていたこともあった――
光栄だったよ
MsgEn:
Actually, when I was young, there was a time when
I worked as a guardian by the side of the Spirit
Dragon. It was an honor.

MsgJp: あ、はい――
MsgEn: Oh, yes...

MsgJp: じ、実は侵食魔に襲われたことがあって――
MsgEn:
Um, actually, I've been attacked by the Infected
before...

MsgJp:
その時はケガするだけで済みましたけど
もし傷口からあの“侵食胞子”が入り込んでいたら
どうなっちゃってたんだろうって――
MsgEn:
At that time, I only ended up with an injury, but
if those "corruption spores" had entered through
the wound, I wonder what would have happened...

MsgJp:
僕はもう村からはあんまり出たくないんですよ
外には侵食魔がいるでしょう
MsgEn:
I don't really want to leave the village anymore.
There are corrupted Infected outside, you know.

MsgJp:
村が侵食魔に襲われないよう
祈るばかりですね――
MsgEn:
We can only pray that the village won't be
attacked by the Corruption.

MsgJp: あ、こんにちは――
MsgEn: Oh, hello...

MsgJp:
僕の仕事ですか？
村の皆のお手伝いをしています
そこのクエストボードを整理したり――
MsgEn:
Is this my job?
I'm helping everyone in the village by organizing
the quest board and...

MsgJp:
まだまだ半人前ですから
皆の仕事内容を
少しずつ教えてもらってるんです
MsgEn:
I'm still just a half-baked novice, so I'm slowly
learning about everyone's job responsibilities.

MsgJp:
父の仕事を手伝いたいのですが――
父は多忙なので、僕がそばにいると
逆に手を煩わせてしまって
MsgEn:
I want to help my father with his work, but...
Since he is very busy, when I am by his side, I
end up just getting in his way instead.

MsgJp:
何かあれば遠慮なくおっしゃってくださいね
旅人に失礼が無いように、と
父に言われています
MsgEn:
If there's anything, please don't hesitate to
speak up.
It's to avoid any disrespect to the traveler, I
have been told by my father.

MsgJp: はいはい、何でしょう
MsgEn: Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
森で採れるハーブは生活に欠かせませんよ
それだけに、森の侵食が進むのは怖くって――
MsgEn:
Herbs harvested from the forest are indispensable
in daily life.
That's why I'm scared to see the forest being
corrupted and overrun.

MsgJp:
草木の侵食が進んでいるところや
侵食魔がいた辺りでは
ハーブを採らないようにしてるんですよ
MsgEn:
In areas where the corruption of vegetation is
advancing, or where there are infected beings, I
make sure not to gather herbs.

MsgJp:
ハーブは料理にも使いますから
気をつけなくちゃって
MsgEn:
Since herbs are also used in cooking, you have to
be careful.

MsgJp:
ふぅ、少し休んだら
干したハーブの様子を見に行かなくちゃ
MsgEn:
Phew.
After taking a little break I should go check on
the dried herbs.

MsgJp: あら、覚者様
MsgEn: Oh, Ser Arisen.

MsgJp:
異国の地でご不便はありませんか？
セントラムに大体のものは揃っているので
何かご用があれば、ぜひ
MsgEn:
Do you have any inconveniences in this foreign
land?
Most things are available in Centrum, so if you
need anything, please feel free to ask.

MsgJp:
旅人がこの村を訪れた時は
親身にもてなそうというのが
族長と族長補佐の方針なんです
MsgEn:
When a traveler visits this village, it is the
policy of the Chief and the Chief's assistant to
warmly welcome them.

MsgJp:
この村の族長はガラダ
族長補佐がモードレッドです
もし責任者と話したい、ということでしたら
彼らのところへどうぞ
MsgEn:
The chief of this village is Gearóid.
The chief assistant is Mordred.
If you wish to speak with the leaders, please go
to their place.

MsgJp:
あ、でもエリアマスターの役目は
アルトフェイルが任されているんです！
エリアの情報なら彼に聞いてみてくださいね
MsgEn:
Ah, but the role of the Area Master is entrusted
to Arthfael!
If you're looking for information about the area,
please ask him.

MsgJp: おや、何か？
MsgEn: Oh, something wrong?

MsgJp:
わたしのことか？
――今は族長補佐をしているが
何事も無ければ、精霊竜の守番長を
務める予定だったのだ
MsgEn:
Is it about me?
- Currently, I am serving as the assistant to the
clan chief.
If nothing goes wrong, I was supposed to be the
head guardian of the Spirit Dragon.

MsgJp:
守番長として務め始めれば
しばらく村には帰って来られない
村にいる間は精一杯族長補佐として働くつもりだ
MsgEn:
If I am to serve as the Chief Guardian, I won't
be able to return to the village for a while.
While I'm here in the village, I intend to work
my hardest as the Deputy Chief.

MsgJp:
これでなかなか忙しいもので
家でゆっくり休む間も無い――
とはいえ、うちの息子が
しっかりした子で助かっている
MsgEn:
With all this, it's quite busy indeed. I have no
time to rest at home.
However, I'm grateful that my son is a reliable
child.

MsgJp:
《芯なる樹》はフィンダムに
暮らす者にとって崇敬の対象であり
同時に、心の拠り所となる景色の一部ともいえる
MsgEn:
The Core Tree is not only revered by those who
live in Phindym, but also considered a part of the
scenic landscape that serves as a sanctuary for
the heart.

MsgJp:
雄大な《芯なる樹》を眺められる場所は
フィンダムのあちこちにある
自分の気に入る場所を探してみるのも
悪くないだろう
MsgEn:
There are various places in Phindym where you can
admire the majestic Core Tree.
It wouldn't hurt to try and find a place that you
like.

MsgJp:
わたしはモルフォール村のモードレッド
ガラダの留守を預かっている
MsgEn:
I am Mordred, from the village of Morfaul,
currently looking after Gearóid's place while he's
away.

MsgJp:
セシリーの恩人はガラダの恩人
そしてわたしの恩人でもある
何もないところだが、くつろいでくれ
MsgEn:
Cecily's benefactor is Gearóid's benefactor, and
also my benefactor.
There isn't much here, but please make yourself
comfortable.

MsgJp:
ガラダが一刻も早く回復するように
客人たちも祈ってくれ
MsgEn:
Please pray for Gearóid's swift recovery, so that
he may heal as soon as possible.

MsgJp:
祈りなど我々の習慣にはなかったが
やってみると、心に刺さったトゲが
抜けていくのがわかるのだ
MsgEn:
Praying was not part of our customs, but when we
tried it, we could feel the thorns being pulled
out of our hearts.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの大地を汚してしまったこと――
おまえたちと出会えたこと――
どちらもわたしは等しく受け入れいている
MsgEn:
I have tarnished the land of Phindym, and yet, I
accept both that and the fact that I have
encountered all of you.

MsgJp:
それがいかんのだろうなあ
善し悪しを区別し、悪しきは排除しなくては
世はいつまでたっても変わらない
MsgEn:
That's the way it goes, isn't it? Distinguishing
between right and wrong, and eliminating the
wicked is necessary. The world won't change unless
we do.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの危機におまえたちの世界と
交流を持てたことを幸運と呼ばずして
なんと呼べばいいのか――
MsgEn:
To have been able to establish a connection with
your world during the crisis in Phindym, what
should I call it if not lucky?

MsgJp: 邪悪な世界と繋がる可能性もあったのだからな
MsgEn:
There was even a possibility of being connected
to an evil world.

MsgJp:
フィンダムはもう大丈夫だ
これからは客人として
この美しい世界を楽しんでくれ
MsgEn:
Phindym is already fine.
From now on, as our esteemed guest, please enjoy
this beautiful world.

MsgJp:
我らの竜の目覚めはまだ先のようだが
大地や空気は徐々に清められている
MsgEn:
It seems that the awakening of our dragon is
still ahead, but the land and the air are
gradually being purified.

MsgJp: セシリーの息吹を感じるよ
MsgEn: I can feel Cecily's breath.

MsgJp: ふむ、何か必要なものでも？
MsgEn: Hmm, do you need something?

MsgJp:
フィンダムにあるものは
全て精霊竜様の恵みの賜物だ
何一つとて無駄にしてよいものは無いと心得よ
MsgEn:
Everything in Phindym is a gift from the Spirit
Dragon's blessing.
Remember that nothing is to be wasted, for
everything serves a purpose.

MsgJp: 何だ、用も無いのに話しかけたのか？
MsgEn: Why did you talk to me when you have no business?

MsgJp: ここに保管してある資材を数え直さねば――
MsgEn: I have to count the materials stored here again...

MsgJp:
必要なものがあるなら、遠慮せず言ってくれ
今この大陸に覚者はいない
我々にとっても、君だけが希望だ
MsgEn:
If you need anything, don't hesitate to tell me.
There are no Arisen on this continent right now.
You are our only hope.

MsgJp:
一つ聞きたい
――モルフォールはどんな様子だ？
MsgEn:
I have one question.
What is Morfaul like?

MsgJp:
何が起こるかはわからない
だが、何が起こってもいいように
資材の管理は万全にしておかねば
MsgEn:
We never know what will happen, but in order to
be prepared for anything, we must manage our
resources with utmost care.

MsgJp:
覚悟はしている
――家族への手紙も書いた
あの渦にすべてが飲み込まれようと
精霊竜様のお傍にいるつもりだ
MsgEn:
I am prepared
―― I have also written a letter to my family
Even if everything is swallowed by that vortex I
intend to stay by the side of the Spirit Dragon.

MsgJp:
異なる大陸からの客人よ
私でお力になれることでしょうか？
MsgEn:
Guest from a different continent,
how may I be of assistance to you?

MsgJp:
癒しを、救いを求めることは
決して悪いことではないはずです
MsgEn:
Seeking healing, seeking salvation, should never
be a bad thing.

MsgJp:
病にかかるは宿命です
しかし、病んだ“芯なる樹”は助けを求めている――
この現状に、我々はどう対処すればいいのでしょう
MsgEn:
It is fate to fall ill.
However, the ailing "Core Tree" is seeking help.
How should we deal with this situation?

MsgJp:
精霊竜の守番として
我々は全力を尽くす所存です――
MsgEn:
As guardians of the Spirit Dragon
We are determined to do our best —

MsgJp:
旅の方にはこの寝床を
<VAL PRICE_INN>にて貸し出しています
簡素な宿ですが――
休んでいかれますか？
MsgEn:
For travelers, we lend out this sleeping space at
<VAL PRICE_INN>.
It is a modest inn, but...
Would you like to rest here?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
本日は旅の方のため、宿を解放しております
どうぞ疲れを癒していってください
MsgEn:
Today, we have opened the inn for travelers.
Please rest and heal your fatigue.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》には<VAL PRICE_WEAK>いただいています
時が経てば自然と治るものですが――
今すぐの回復をご希望でしょうか？
MsgEn:
I am receiving <VAL PRICE_WEAK> for "Treat
Weakness", yes?
While it usually heals naturally over time, would
you like immediate recovery?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
おや、困りました――
弱化していないようですよ
気持ちがお疲れなのかもしれません
少しここでゆっくりしていかれては？
MsgEn:
Oh, dear, this is troublesome――
It seems that you are not weakened.
Perhaps you are feeling tired?
Why don't you take a rest here for a while?

MsgJp:
異なる大陸からの客人よ
――空の異変の件で
来てくださったのですか？
MsgEn:
Greetings, visitor from a different continent.
――Did you come here regarding the abnormality in
the sky?

MsgJp:
フィンダムの空に
あのような禍禍しいものが――
MsgEn:
In the sky of Phindym, such a calamitous presence
looms――

MsgJp:
何が起ころうと
我々は精霊竜の守番
ここを離れるわけにはまいりません
MsgEn:
No matter what may happen, We are the guardians
of the Spirit Dragon.
We cannot leave this place

MsgJp:
精霊竜セシリーの心も
常にあなたとともにあることでしょう
MsgEn:
Surely, the heart of the Spirit Dragon Cecily is
always with you.

MsgJp: はい――
MsgEn: Yes...

MsgJp:
この周辺の見張りには自分が出ています
他の２人よりも体力がありますから
MsgEn:
I am on watch duty in this area.
Because I have more stamina than the other two.

MsgJp:
“芯なる樹”から伸びる
各聖域の見回りも自分の仕事です
MsgEn:
It is also my job to patrol each sacred ground
that extends from the "Core Tree".

MsgJp:
――何かあれば一早く気付くことが
できる立場でしょう
MsgEn:
In a position where you can notice anything early
on, if something were to happen.

MsgJp:
精霊竜様のご様子を常に傍で見守る役割
それが“精霊竜の守番”です
誇りに思う者も多いのですよ
MsgEn:
The role of constantly watching over the Spirit
Dragon's condition, that's what it means to be a
"Spirit Dragon Guardian."
Many take pride in this role.

MsgJp:
険しい顔をされていますね
――この状況です、無理もありませんが
MsgEn:
You have a stern expression
――Given the situation, it's understandable

MsgJp:
お一人では危険です
共に進む仲間が必要であれば
自分が手配いたしましょう
MsgEn:
It is dangerous to go alone.
If you need companions to journey together, I
will make arrangements for you.

MsgJp:
マイアとドハティも
落ち着こうと努めているようです
彼らはまだ若い――
それぞれに葛藤があることでしょう
MsgEn:
Maia and Doherty also seem to be trying to calm
down.
They are still young - each surely has their own
struggles.

MsgJp:
あの禍禍しい渦については
あまり話したくありませんね
よく、わからないものですから
MsgEn:
Regarding that ominous whirlpool...
I don't really want to talk about it, because
it's something I don't understand well.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷を訪れし異国の覚者よ
このキアランが用件を聞こう
MsgEn:
Oh Arisen from a distant land who has visited the
Kingal Canyon.
Let Ciarán hear your purpose.

MsgJp:
神殿や遺跡に対し、畏怖の念を持つことは大切だ
そうやって伝統が守られ
また、伝統によって我らが守られてきたのだ
MsgEn:
It is important to have a sense of awe towards
temples and ruins. It is through this respect that
traditions are preserved, and it is through these
traditions that we have been protected.

MsgJp:
我らが変化を拒もうと
我らを取り巻く環境は常に変わってゆくのでは――
“侵食”という災厄に触れ
一層そう思うことが多くなった
MsgEn:
As we try to resist change the environment
surrounding us is constantly shifting.
I have come to think this even more after
experiencing the calamity known as "Corruption."

MsgJp:
若者の柔らかい感性が、環境の変化を
敏感に感じ取っているというのであれば
遅かれ早かれ、我らも
意識を改めねばならないのかもしれないと――
MsgEn:
If the sensitive sensibilities of the younger
generation can keenly perceive environmental
changes, then sooner or later, we may need to
reconsider our own awareness as well.

MsgJp:
むむ、話が長くなってしまった
これだからいつもメーヴに呆れられる
すまない
MsgEn:
Hmm, the conversation has become rather lengthy.
This is why Maeve always finds me exasperating.
I apologize.

MsgJp:
村の若者には
伝統を重んじるこの村の空気を
嫌う者もいるようだ
MsgEn:
It seems that some of the village's young people
dislike the atmosphere of this village, which
values tradition.

MsgJp:
族長として頭の痛い問題だ
彼らも成長すればきっと
わかってくれると信じたいが――
MsgEn:
As the clan chief, it's a headache-inducing
problem.
I want to believe that they will understand, once
they grow up.

MsgJp:
キンガルに来るのは初めてだったな
少しこの地について話しておこう
俺はエリアマスターのキアランという
MsgEn:
This was my first time coming to Kingal.
Let me tell you a little bit about this place.
I am Ciarán, one of the Area Masters.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷は多くの遺跡や神殿を残す
フィンダム文化の要所的地帯だ
MsgEn:
Kingal Canyon is a crucial region of the Phindym
culture, with many ruins and temples remaining.

MsgJp:
そのような地に住まう者として
我々グリンデュアの民は古来よりの伝承や
伝統の守り手としての側面を持っている
MsgEn:
As inhabitants of such a land, the people of
Glyndwr have long been keepers of ancient
traditions and guardians of our heritage.

MsgJp:
貴君もこの地に留まるのであれば――
キンガルの伝統に敬意を払うべきだ
そうすれば村人との衝突も無いだろう
MsgEn:
If you are going to stay in this land—
You should respect Kingal's traditions.
That way, there will be no conflict with the
villagers.

MsgJp:
他の村は侵食魔との戦いに
やっきになっているようだが
グリンデュアは――また別の問題に直面している
MsgEn:
While other villages are becoming obsessed with
the battle against the Corruption, Glyndwr is
facing another problem.

MsgJp:
遺跡を守ってきたグリンデュアならではの
問題というものがあるのだ――
MsgEn:
Glyndwr, who has protected the ruins, has its own
unique issues to deal with.

MsgJp:
――いや、異国から旅をしてきた者に
このようなこと話すべきではなかったかもしれん
忘れてくれ
MsgEn:
No, perhaps I should not have spoken of such
things to one who has traveled from a distant
land.
Please, forget about it.

MsgJp:
大方、このグリンデュアには少しの間
留まるだけのつもりなのだろう
――この辺りは質の良い鉱石が採れる
それらを拾って帰ることだ
MsgEn:
Most likely, I intend to stay in Glyndwr for a
little while.
This area has some high-quality ore to be mined,
so I plan to gather them and take them back.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷は地形の複雑さもあって
なかなか冒険がしづらいのではないか？
少しだが、これを足しにするといい
MsgEn:
Kingal Canyon's complex terrain can make it
challenging for adventurers, don't you think?
Adding a little something to it could be
beneficial.

MsgJp:
グリンデュアの大地――
いや、我々のために尽力してくれて感謝している
これは日々の礼のつもりだ
MsgEn:
The land of Glyndwr, or rather, I'm grateful for
your efforts on our behalf.
This is meant to be a daily expression of
gratitude.

MsgJp:
これを受け取ってくれ
お前のためにと、村の者たちから
自然と集まったものだ
旅に役立ててもらえれば我々も本望だ
MsgEn:
Please accept this.
It is gathered naturally from the villagers, for
your sake.
We would be grateful if you could make use of it
on your journey.

MsgJp:
異国の覚者か――
エリアマスターとして忠告しておこう
MsgEn:
A Foreign Arisen, huh? As an Area Master, let me
give you some advice.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 945>》に新手の魔物が
出現したらしい
近くを通る時は警戒を怠らぬよう
気を引き締めることだ
MsgEn:
It seems that a new type of enemy has appeared
in《<SPOT 945>》.
When passing by nearby, be sure not to neglect
your vigilance and remain on high alert.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 945>》についてはもちろん問題だが
最近はこのキンガル全域で
魔族が活性化してきている節もある――
MsgEn:
Regarding 《<SPOT 945>》, of course, there are
issues.
However, recently, there seems to be an
invigoration of Fiends throughout the entire
region of Kingal.

MsgJp:
我々としても、どうにか遺跡に踏み込んで
調査を行いたいところだが、封印が施されている
場所もあって手を付けられないでいるのだ
MsgEn:
As for us, we would like to somehow enter the
ruins and conduct investigations, but there are
places that have been sealed and we cannot touch
them.

MsgJp:
村の内では若者たちの不満がくすぶり
村の外では魔物が着々とその勢力を
広めている――悩ましいことだ
MsgEn:
Within the village, the dissatisfaction of the
young people smolders, while outside the village,
the enemy steadily expands its influence - a
troubling situation.

MsgJp:
異国の覚者よ
貴君、この村の者に
何かと話しかけているのか？
MsgEn:
Oh, wise one from a foreign land.
Are you speaking to the people of this village
about something?

MsgJp:
――いや、俺から何か言うことではないが
オイングスが貴君に話したいことが
あるそうだ
MsgEn:
Well, it's not for me to say, but it seems that
Oengus has something he wants to talk to you
about.

MsgJp:
話を聞いてやってもらえるのなら
もう一度俺に話しかけてくれ
取り次がせてもらおう
MsgEn:
If you can listen to my story, please talk to me
again, and I'll make sure to pass it on.

MsgJp:
そういえば、異国の覚者よ――
先日はオイングスの頼みを聞いてもらったそうだな
MsgEn:
By the way, esteemed Arisen from a foreign land,
I heard that you recently helped Oengus with a
request.

MsgJp:
どうやらヤツも最初は秘密にしたかったようだが
キンガルに異変が起きているかもしれない、と
打ち明けてきたのだ
MsgEn:
It seems that he also wanted to keep it a secret
at first, but he confided in me that there may be
a disturbance in Kingal.

MsgJp:
俺からも族長として礼を言おう
村の危機を救ってくれて感謝する
MsgEn:
I, as the chief, shall also express my gratitude.
Thank you for saving the village from crisis.

MsgJp:
――異なる竜に仕えているというのに
フィンダムにも救いの手を差し伸べてくれるとは
貴君も人が良いのだな
MsgEn:
To think that even while serving different
dragons, you would extend a helping hand to
Phindym.
You truly are a kind-hearted person.

MsgJp:
ひとつ――
聞き流してくれて構わんのだが
少し耳を貸してくれないだろうか
MsgEn:
One thing――
I don't mind if you just let it pass you by, but
could you lend me your ear for a moment?

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 911>》から魔物が這い出して
きているという報告が入ってきている
どうしても中を改めねばならん時がきているようだ
MsgEn:
We have received reports that monsters are
crawling out from《<SPOT 911>》.
It seems that the time has come when we
absolutely need to make changes inside.

MsgJp:
異国の者を頼るということに
村の内部ではまだ抵抗する者が多い――
しかし、フィンダムの覚者が不在である今
頼れるのは貴君しかいないのだ
MsgEn:
There are still many within the village who
resist the idea of relying on outsiders.
However, with the absence of Phindym's Arisen,
you are the only one we can depend on right now.

MsgJp:
もし貴君さえよければ
かの遺跡の内部を調べてきて
もらえないだろうか――
意にそわねば、聞かなかったことにしてくれ
MsgEn:
If you're willing, could you investigate the
interior of that ancient ruin?
If you don't feel like it, you can pretend you
didn't hear it.

MsgJp:
この考えは最近確信に変わったのだが
貴君は――心からの良心によって
グリンデュアを救おうとしてくれているのだな
MsgEn:
This belief has turned into a conviction for me
recently, and you... you're trying to save Glyndwr
with all your heart.

MsgJp:
確かに、この未曾有の危機にあって
我らの覚者に頼ることもできないとあっては
貴君の助けを受け入れた方がよいだろう
MsgEn:
Certainly, in this unprecedented crisis, we can't
rely on our Arisen.
It would be better to accept your help.

MsgJp:
――ここは考え込んではいられない
俺は、このグリンデュアの族長として
正式に貴君の助けを請うことにしよう
MsgEn:
I cannot afford to hesitate here. As the chief of
Glyndwr, I have decided to formally request your
assistance.

MsgJp:
村人の中にはまだ貴君のことを
受け入れられない者も多いかもしれないが
どうか、大目に見てやってほしい
MsgEn:
There may still be many villagers who cannot
accept you, but please, be understanding.

MsgJp:
過去を守ることで存続してきた村なのだ
そう簡単に全てを変えられるわけではない――
だが、過去に囚われ前進を拒む姿勢は
俺が正してゆこう
MsgEn:
This village has endured by upholding its past.
It's not so simple to change everything, but I
will rectify the mindset that refuses to move
forward, bound by the past.

MsgJp:
なんといっても、文句を言う者たちも
《<SPOT 947>》に現れた魔物を
打ち倒す力を持ってはいないのだから――
MsgEn:
After all, those who complain don't have the
power to defeat the demons that appeared at <SPOT
947>, so –

MsgJp:
あの場に魔物がとどまっているせいで
南東の遺跡の調査に進めない状態なのだ
MsgEn:
We can't continue with the investigation of the
southeastern ruins because monsters are lingering
at that site.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 947>》の近くを通ることがあれば
魔物を追い払ってくれるよう
頼めないだろうか
MsgEn:
If you happen to pass by near <SPOT 947>, could
you please help drive away the monsters?

MsgJp:
貴君はこの村において
どんどん理解者を増やしているようだな
MsgEn:
My lord, it seems that you are steadily
increasing the number of understanding individuals
in this village.

MsgJp:
先日、シェドレアン大神殿前の橋の
修繕が終わったのは知っているか？
実は、そこへ魔族が現れ
いまだ通行が難しくなっている
MsgEn:
Did you know that the repairs on the bridge in
front of the Shadolean Great Temple were completed
the other day?
Actually, fiends have appeared there, making it
still difficult to pass through.

MsgJp:
この件について、ボーデシアが
貴君に言いたいことがあるというのだ
MsgEn:
Boadicea has something to tell you about this
matter.

MsgJp:
今まで若者との間に軋轢を生んでいた
ボーデシアでさえ、貴君に話がしたいと
いうのだから大したものだな――
MsgEn:
Even Boadicea, who has been causing tension among
the young people, wants to talk to you – that's
quite something.

MsgJp:
ああ、ボーデシアに話をしに行くのであれば
俺にもう一度話しかけてほしい
責任を持って取り次がせてもらおう
MsgEn:
Ah, if you're going to talk to Boadicea, please
talk to me again. I'll make sure to relay it
responsibly.

MsgJp:
異国の覚者よ、聞いてほしい――
《<SPOT 912>》はこのキンガルに
おいてもかなり大規模な遺跡だ
MsgEn:
Listen, foreign Arisen. <SPOT 912> is quite a
large ruin even here in Kingal.

MsgJp:
しかし、実はここについても
気軽に調査ができるわけではないのだ
なんといっても、入口は厳重に封印されている
MsgEn:
However, the truth is that you can't just
casually investigate this place.
After all, the entrance is securely sealed.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 912>》は元々神殿として
使われていた遺跡――
MsgEn:
<SPOT 912> was originally an ancient ruin that
served as a Temple.

MsgJp:
恐らくその場で働いていたと思われる
巫女が《<SPOT 913>》に葬られている
MsgEn:
It is believed that the shrine maiden who was
probably working there is buried at <SPOT 913>.

MsgJp:
彼女の墓である《<SPOT 913>》を
調査することで、封印を解く
手がかりが得られるはずだ
MsgEn:
By investigating her grave at <SPOT 913>, you
should be able to find clues to break the seal.

MsgJp:
我々も調査隊を出そうとは思っているが
まずは貴君に先行して魔物を討ち倒しておいて
もらいたいのだ――頼めるだろうか
MsgEn:
We are also planning to send out an investigation
team, but first, we would like you to take the
lead and defeat the enemies.
Can we count on you for this?

MsgJp:
先日は世話になった――
貴君に《<SPOT 913>》へ先行してもらった
おかげで、後続の調査隊は安全に
調査に集中できたという
MsgEn:
I am grateful for your assistance the other day.
Thanks to you, the subsequent investigation team
was able to safely concentrate on their
investigation after you went ahead to <SPOT 913>.

MsgJp:
さらに、その時の調査によって
《<SPOT 912>》の封印を解くための
手がかりをえることができたのだ
MsgEn:
Furthermore, through the investigation at that
time, we were able to obtain clues to unlock the
seal of <SPOT 912>,

MsgJp:
――だが、悪い知らせもある
封印を解こうとしている動きを
魔物たちに察知されたようだ
MsgEn:
However, there is also bad news.
It seems that the movement to release the seal
has been detected by the enemy monsters.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 949>》に魔族が現れ
我々の行く手を阻んでいる
それどころか、この村に侵攻しようとする
動きすらあるのだ
MsgEn:
Fiends have appeared in 《<SPOT 949>》, blocking
our path.
Not only that, they are even trying to invade
this village.
There is movement, indeed.

MsgJp:
異国の――いや、白き竜の覚者よ
我々が封印を解かんとしている間
湧き出でる魔族を討伐してほしい――
MsgEn:
O Arisen of the White Dragon,
While we are in the process of unsealing, We ask
that you subdue the surging Fiends.

MsgJp:
うまくいけば、あと少しで
この騒動にも決着がつくはずなのだ――
MsgEn:
If all goes well, there should be a resolution to
this turmoil soon—just a little further to go.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者よ――
よい頃合いに来てくれた！
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon!
You have come at a good time!

MsgJp:
かねてより封印を解かんと励んでいた
《<SPOT 912>》の封印を
ついに解くことができたのだ！
MsgEn:
We've been diligently working to unlock the seal
at "<SPOT 912>", and we have finally succeeded!

MsgJp:
どうか、かの神殿に赴き
魔族が活性化した理由を
探ってきてもらえないだろうか
MsgEn:
Please, visit the Temple and investigate the
reason behind the Fiends' resurgence.

MsgJp:
引き受けてもらえるのなら
あの辺りの事情について詳しい者を
貴君に紹介しよう
準備ができたら俺に話しかけてくれ
MsgEn:
If you're willing to take on the task, I'll
introduce someone who knows the situation in that
area well.
When you're ready, talk to me.

MsgJp:
グリンデュアの様子を見にきてくれたのか
ありがたいことだ――
MsgEn:
Did you come to see the state of Glyndwr?
I appreciate it.

MsgJp:
あれ以来は静かなものだ――
侵食という災いはいまだ大地をむしばんでいるが
忌まわしい魔族に脅かされることはない
MsgEn:
Since then, it has been quiet—
Though the calamity of corruption still gnaws at
the land,
We are not threatened by the loathsome fiends.

MsgJp:
貴君には続けて世話になったな
この辺りに来た時は、今日のように
ぜひ村に寄ってくれ
MsgEn:
I have relied on your kind assistance for some
time now.
When you come to this area, please be sure to
visit the village.

MsgJp:
グリンデュアは貴君のために
より質の良い支援品を集めておくことを
約束しよう
MsgEn:
Glyndwr promises to gather better-quality support
items for you.
It's thanks to your help that we were able to
recapture the Thines fort, after all.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者よ――
実は、グリンデュアはまたも
魔族の脅威にさらされているのだ――
MsgEn:
Arisen of the White Dragon, Glyndwr is once again
threatened by the forces of darkness.

MsgJp:
《シェレドアン大神殿》は一因にすぎないと
すれば、どこかに魔族がやってくる
元凶となる場があるはずなのだが――
今のところ見つかっていない
MsgEn:
The "Shadolean Great Temple" is only one factor.
There must be a place where the demons come from,
the root cause.
But it hasn't been found yet.

MsgJp:
過去の文献をあたることで手がかりが
つかめるかと、文献が多数残されている小塔への
門を開けることにした
MsgEn:
By accessing past records, we hope to find clues.
So, I decided to open the gate to the small
tower, where numerous documents have been
preserved.

MsgJp:
また、このキンガル峡谷のため
手を貸してはもらえないだろうか――
MsgEn: Could you lend a hand for the Kingal Canyon too?

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者よ
どうか聞いてほしい――
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, I hope you will
listen...

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷北部には
《<SPOT 914>》という
大規模な遺跡があるのだが――
MsgEn:
In the northern part of Kingal Canyon, there's a
large ruin called "<SPOT 914>," but –

MsgJp:
実は、その遺跡を中心に強力な魔物が
徘徊しているという情報が入ってきているのだ
MsgEn:
In fact, there is information that powerful
enemies are wandering around the ruins.

MsgJp:
我が村の者が魔物と対峙しても
生きて戻ってくることは難しいだろう――
覚者よ、どうかその白き竜の加護によって
魔物を打ち払ってもらえないだろうか
MsgEn:
It is difficult for our villagers to confront the
enemy and return alive.
Arisen, would you please help drive away the
enemies with the protection of the White Dragon?

MsgJp:
――《<SPOT 914>》の近くには
《<SPOT 959>》という
人の住まう塔がある
MsgEn:
Near <SPOT 914>, there is a tower inhabited by
people called <SPOT 959>.

MsgJp:
かの塔に暮らす人々は独自の文化を持つため
交流になかなかの難しさがあるのだが――
MsgEn:
The people who live in that Tower have their own
unique culture, so there are quite a few
difficulties in communication.

MsgJp:
昨今の魔族出現の件にて交渉を重ね、拠点として
門戸を開放するよう約束を取り付けた
MsgEn:
Through repeated negotiations regarding the
recent appearance of Fiends, a promise was secured
to open the gates and establish a Hall as a base.

MsgJp:
恐らく住民には歓迎されないだろうとは思うが
《<SPOT 959>》を調査の足場として
あるいは旅の疲れを癒すため
役立ててほしい――
MsgEn:
It probably won't be welcomed by the residents,
but you can use <SPOT 959> as a base for your
investigations or to rest from your travels.

MsgJp:
魔物の討伐を引き受けてもらえるなら
俺にその件を話しかけてくれ
詳しく説明しよう
MsgEn:
If you can take on the task of subduing monsters,
please approach me about that matter.
I'll explain it in detail.

MsgJp:
貴君には度々力を貸してもらっているというのに
不甲斐ないことだが、状況は悪化の
一路を辿るばかりだ――
MsgEn:
I've had you lend your strength many times, and
I'm sorry for my ineffectiveness.
The situation is only getting worse.

MsgJp:
とうとう、これまで儀式に使われていた場にまで
侵食魔の姿が確認されるように
なってしまった――
MsgEn:
Finally, the appearance of the Corruption has
been confirmed in the very place where rituals
were held.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 953>》――元は大地に
季節の感謝を表す舞踊を奉じる場だったのだ
最近は魔物の凶暴性が高まったがゆえに
安全を考えて中止されていたが――
MsgEn:
《<SPOT 953>》――Originally, it was a place to
perform a dance that expressed gratitude for
seasons of the earth.
Recently, it has been cancelled for safety
reasons due to the increased aggression of the
enemies.

MsgJp:
侵食は大地だけではなく
我々の文化も蝕んでゆくという一例なのだろうな
――もっと早くに対処していれば――
MsgEn:
Corruption not only consumes the land, but also
serves as an example of how it erodes our culture.
If only we had dealt with it sooner...

MsgJp:
今まで立ち入りを禁じていた
《<SPOT 915>》も
もはや封鎖している意味はないだろう
MsgEn:
There is now no longer any meaning in continuing
to block off <SPOT 915> that was previously
prohibited from being entered.

MsgJp:
封鎖はすでに解いてある――
もしも貴君の調査によって
何らかの手がかりとなるようであれば
ぜひ調べてみてくれ――
MsgEn:
The seal has already been broken. If your
investigation could provide any clues, please
examine it.

MsgJp:
来てくれてよかった――
こちらから貴君へ遣いを出そうかと
思案していたところだ
MsgEn:
I'm glad you came. I was considering sending
someone to you to discuss matters.

MsgJp:
先ほど判明したのだが、小塔に収められた
書物に“スカージ”の名があったのだ
――強大な悪魔の名前だ
MsgEn:
I found out earlier that the book stored in the
small tower has the name "Scourge."
It's the name of a powerful demon.

MsgJp:
今まで魔族が無尽蔵に襲来していたのは
スカージが呼び寄せていたせいだろう
MsgEn:
The reason why the fiends have been invading
endlessly until now is probably because of the
Scourge calling them.

MsgJp:
今、あの強大な魔物に太刀打ちできるのは
白き竜の覚者――貴君だけだろう
どうか、ヤツを討ってくれないだろうか
MsgEn:
Now, the one who can confront that mighty demon
is the White Dragon's Arisen – perhaps you can
defeat it for us?

MsgJp:
今までの敵とは違う、あまりにも
危険すぎる相手だ――
無理にとは言えない――
MsgEn:
This is a different kind of danger from the
enemies we've faced so far – it's not something we
can force.

MsgJp:
だが、もし――
もしも、此度も力を貸してくれるのであれば
再び俺に声をかけてほしい――
MsgEn:
However, if... if you are willing to lend your
strength again this time, please call on me once
more.

MsgJp:
おお、白き竜の覚者よ――
よく来てくれた
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon ――
Thank you for coming.

MsgJp:
侵食という未曾有の災害に見舞われたフィンダム
その中でも、さらに魔族の脅威に繰り返し
さらされたグリンデュアが――今もこうして
あるのは全て貴君の力添えあってこそ
MsgEn:
Phindym, which was struck by the unprecedented
disaster of Corruption, and Glyndwr, who has been
repeatedly exposed to the threat of the Fiends, is
still here today, thanks to all your support.

MsgJp:
これまでの礼として
今後、貴君への支給品の質をより向上させる
ことを決定した
MsgEn:
As a token of gratitude so far, we have decided
to improve the quality of supplies to you in the
future.

MsgJp:
これは俺だけではなく
このグリンデュアの民の総意だ
どうか受け取ってくれ
MsgEn:
This is not just from me, but the unanimous
decision of the people of Glyndwr. Please accept
it.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者よ
きっと来てくれるものと思っていた
MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, I believed that
you would surely come.

MsgJp:
今、フィンダムに覚者はいない
セシリーが覚者としてすごしていたならば
――いや、こんなことを言ってもしようがないな
MsgEn:
Currently, there are no Arisen in Phindym.
If Cecily had lived as an Arisen...
No, there's no point in saying such things.

MsgJp:
みな不安がっている
もし、時間があればだが――
頼りに思う貴君に声をかけられれば、少しは
気も安らぐことだろう
MsgEn:
Everyone is feeling anxious. If you have the
time, it would be reassuring for us if you, whom
we rely on, could lend us your voice.

MsgJp:
ガラダがフィンダム中の族長に
いち早く連携を提案してくれた
これは、先日の危機を乗り越えた賜物といえるな
MsgEn:
Gearóid reached out to the chieftains of Phindym,
proposing cooperation swiftly.
This is truly a testament to overcoming the
recent crisis.

MsgJp:
ああ――異国の覚者ね
何の用かしら
MsgEn:
Oh, you're an Arisen from a foreign land. What do
you need?

MsgJp:
ここまで来るのに疲れたって？
一眠りすれば楽になるんじゃない
ここに泊まるなら<VAL PRICE_INN>だけど
泊まっていくの？
MsgEn:
You're tired from coming all this way?
Maybe you'll feel better after a nap.
If you're staying here, it's <VAL PRICE_INN>. Are
you going to stay?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
疲れてるんなら
ホラ、寝床好きに使っていいから――
で、休んでいくの？
MsgEn:
If you're tired, well, you can use my bed if you
want――
So, are you going to rest?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
――《弱化の治療》なら
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>よ
まぁ、どうするかは自分次第ね
治療していく？
MsgEn:
If it's Treat Weakness, it's <VAL PRICE_WEAK>.
Well, it's up to you what to do.
Shall we proceed with the treatment?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
なんだ、弱化してないじゃない
眠いんなら泊まっていきなさいよ
腹が減ってるならシェナの料理を
食べていくといい
MsgEn:
What, you haven't weakened, have you?
If you're tired, why don't you stay the night?
And if you're hungry, it's best to eat Shena's
cuisine.

MsgJp:
あたしはココを切り盛りしてるだけよ
エリアの情報はキアランに聞くのね
MsgEn:
I'm just managing this place.
If you want information about the area, ask
Ciarán.

MsgJp:
キアランはやたら考えこむクセがあるわ
聞きたいことがあるなら要点を絞って聞くことね
じゃないと、話が長くなるから
MsgEn:
Ciarán has a habit of overthinking.
If you have something you want to ask, make it
concise.
Otherwise, the conversation will drag on.

MsgJp:
ん？
キアランはあたしのダンナよ
MsgEn:
Huh?
Ciarán is my husband.

MsgJp:
考え込むのが好きで、素早く物事を決めないから
拠点の中のことはあたしが回した方が
効率がいいの
MsgEn:
Because I enjoy pondering and don't make quick
decisions, it's more efficient for me to handle
matters within the base.

MsgJp:
少し休んでいく？
疲れた顔のままではここから出せないわね
MsgEn:
Are you going to take a little rest?
You can't go out from here with such a tired face.

MsgJp:
キアランはやたら考え込むでしょう
だから、今は立ち止まって考えるのをやめて
村の皆がいつも通り暮らせるようにってことにだけ
集中するように言ったのよ
MsgEn:
Ciarán tends to ponder a lot, doesn't he?
That's why I told him to stop and not think too
much for now.
Just concentrate on ensuring that everyone in the
village can live as usual.

MsgJp:
それぞれが怯えて
妙なことをし始めないようにね
MsgEn:
So that each person does not start doing strange
things out of fear.

MsgJp:
怖くないといえば嘘になる
でも、眠っているとはいえ精霊竜セシリーがいて
こうして異国の人たちも来てくれてる
MsgEn:
To say that it's not scary would be a lie.
But even though she's asleep, Spirit Dragon
Cecily is here.
And we also have people from foreign lands like
this who have come.

MsgJp:
それに、あたしにはキアランがいる
キアランにはあたしが付いてる
――きっと、それほど悪くないわ
MsgEn:
And, I have Ciarán, and Ciarán has me. Surely,
it's not that bad.

MsgJp:
ダナが戦士を出してくれたって聞いてるわ
きっとあたしたち、“前の騒動”の時よりかは
結束できているのよね
MsgEn:
I heard Dana has sent out warriors. I'm sure
we're more united than during the "previous
incident."

MsgJp: よっ、色々見ていってくれ
MsgEn: Hey, go ahead and take a look at various things.

MsgJp: 何で“大人”って怖がりなんだろうな
MsgEn: I wonder why "adults" are always afraid.

MsgJp:
あのさ、この村で建設的な話ができるのは
マヴェイル兄貴だけだぜ！
――俺はそう思ってる！
MsgEn:
Listen, there's no one else in this village I can
have a constructive conversation with except for
my big brother Mavail. That's what I think.

MsgJp:
“立派な大人”たちは、ほら――
頭が固いんだよな
ああはなりたくないよ
MsgEn:
"Respected adults" are often quite stubborn. I
hope I don't become like that.

MsgJp:
あ、ああ
覚者さんか、いらっしゃい
MsgEn: Oh, you're an Arisen! Welcome.

MsgJp:
キアランが普段通り店を開けろっていうから
こうしてるけどさぁ――
MsgEn:
Because Ciarán told me to open the shop as usual,
I'm doing it like this, you know...

MsgJp:
大変なことになったって、頭ではわかってるんだけど
いまいち実感が無いんだ――悪い冗談みたいでさ
かと思えば、急にものすごく怖くなる
どうしたらいいのかな
MsgEn:
I know in my head that things have become really
difficult, but I can't quite grasp the reality of
it—it feels like a bad joke.
And then suddenly, I become incredibly scared.
What should I do?

MsgJp:
あのさ――これで終わりなんかじゃないよな
フィンダムは――まだ、なんとかなるよな
頼むよ、そうだって言ってくれ
MsgEn:
Hey, you know... this can't be the end, right?
Phindym... there has to be a way. Please, tell me
it's true.

MsgJp:
呼んだかい！
さっ、何が食べたい？
MsgEn:
Have you called for me?
Well then, what would you like to eat?

MsgJp:
さぁさぁ、お腹いっぱい食べとくれ！
覚者さんも体が資本でしょ
食べて力付けなきゃ！
MsgEn:
Come on, come on, eat until your belly is full!
Even the Arisen relies on their body.
You have to eat and gain strength!

MsgJp: 何だい、好き嫌いしちゃダメだよ！
MsgEn: What's wrong? You can't be picky!

MsgJp:
ガッカリきた時、活力が出ない時――
そんな時は美味しいものを食べるのが一番だよ！
さ、何が食べたい？
MsgEn:
When you're disappointed, when you lack vitality――
The best thing to do is eat something delicious!
So, what do you want to eat?

MsgJp:
覚者さん、お腹いっぱい食べてっとくれ！
こんな時だからこそ、食べるのを
おろそかにしちゃいけないんだから！
MsgEn:
Arisen, please eat until you're full!
Especially at times like this, you shouldn't
neglect to eat
!

MsgJp:
明日この世が終わるってわけでもないんだろう？
だったら、今日食べて、明日も食べなきゃ
毎日美味しいものを作るからさ――
MsgEn:
This world isn't ending tomorrow, is it?
So, let's eat today and tomorrow too, I'll make
something delicious every day――

MsgJp:
空を見たかって？
――見たくないから、見てないよ
変に見ちゃったら怖くなるかもしれないからね
MsgEn:
You want to look at the sky?
Well, I haven't looked because I might get scared
if I see something strange.

MsgJp:
みんな、お腹いっぱい食べれば
少しは落ち着くと思うんだけど
緊張しちゃって食べる気にならないみたい
MsgEn:
Everyone might feel a bit calmer if they eat
their fill, but it seems they're too nervous to
eat.

MsgJp: 同行者を探したいなら手を貸そう
MsgEn: If you want to find a companion, let me help you.

MsgJp:
遺跡には近寄るなよ
村の者にはよく言い聞かせてある
異国の覚者とて例外ではない
MsgEn:
Don't approach the ruins. I've made it clear to
the villagers. Even foreign Arisen are not
exceptions.

MsgJp:
自分が異国から来たからといって
ここの掟を軽んじないことだ
MsgEn:
Just because you're from a foreign land doesn't
mean you should disregard the rules here.

MsgJp:
遺跡に近づく者あらば災いが起こる――
そう言い伝えられているのだ
MsgEn:
Trouble is said to befall those who approach the
ruins. This is a well-established belief.

MsgJp:
先人の知恵を無視して
村の平穏は無い
MsgEn:
Ignoring the wisdom of our ancestors, the village
knows no peace.

MsgJp: ううむ――
MsgEn: Hmm...

MsgJp:
あの渦、まるでこの世の災いという災いを
かき集めたかのような禍禍しさだ
MsgEn:
That vortex, it exudes a calamitous intent, as if
gathering all the misfortunes of this world.

MsgJp:
用が無いなら話しかけるな
今は気軽に話していられる状況ではない
MsgEn:
If you have no business, do not talk to me.
It is not a situation where we can speak casually
right now.

MsgJp:
フィンダムは災い続きだ
やはり、言い伝えを――先人の知恵を
無視したからこうなっているのでは――
そう考えるのも当然のことだと思わないか
MsgEn:
Phindym has been plagued by disasters.
It's natural to think that it's because they
ignored traditions and wisdom passed down by their
ancestors.

MsgJp: ――何か用でも？
MsgEn: Yes, may I help you with something?

MsgJp:
遺跡には近付くことなかれ――
これは昔からこの村に伝わる掟だ
近付いたら、村に一体どんな災いが起こるか――
MsgEn:
Do not approach the ruins――
This is a rule that has been passed down in this
village since ancient times.
If you approach, what kind of disaster will
befall the village――

MsgJp:
その昔、神殿に足を踏み入れた者がいたそうな――
無事に神殿を出ることはできたんだが
安心して後ろを振り返った瞬間――
MsgEn:
In the old days, it is said that someone set foot
in the temple.
They managed to get out safely, but the moment
they relaxed and looked back—

MsgJp:
神殿の入り口から伸びた巨大な腕に
ズバーッと頭から切り裂かれた！！
MsgEn:
A massive arm extended from the temple entrance
and slashed them right through, from the head
first!!

MsgJp:
――という話もあるんだぞ
古い場所には近寄らないことだ
MsgEn:
There's a saying that you shouldn't approach the
old places.

MsgJp:
――お前さん
自分だけは強いから
遺跡の災いも怖くないと思ってるんじゃないか？
思い上がりだぞ、それは
MsgEn:
You think you're invincible because you believe
that the danger of the ruins doesn't scare you?
That's just arrogance.

MsgJp:
あの渦を見ろ！
はやくどうにかしてくれ！
MsgEn:
Look at that vortex! Please, do something about
it soon!

MsgJp:
こんな空は見たことがない
ああ、一生見たくなかった！
MsgEn:
I've never seen a sky like this. Oh, I wish I'd
never seen it!

MsgJp:
とんでもないことになるぞ――
災いだ、きっとこれこそが遺跡の災いだ！
MsgEn:
This is going to be a major disaster, I'm sure of
it! A calamity! It must be the disaster of the
ruins!

MsgJp:
どこかに逃げないといけないんじゃないか？
キアランは落ち着くべきだと言っていたが
本当は自分たちだけ逃げるつもりなんじゃ――？
く、口ではなんとでも言えるぞ
MsgEn:
Do we need to escape somewhere?
Ciarán said we should calm down, but are we
really planning to escape on our own?
Hah, you can say anything with your mouth, can't
you?

MsgJp: ああ、異国の覚者さんか
MsgEn: Ah, an Arisen from a foreign land.

MsgJp:
もっと遠くに採掘に行けたらなぁ――
村も潤うし、いいこと尽くめなのにな――
MsgEn:
If only we could go mining further away—
The village would prosper, and it would be all
good.—

MsgJp:
この村では遠出は禁じられているんだ
俺の脚なら遠出しても
その日のうちに帰ってこられるのに――
MsgEn:
In this village, going far is prohibited.
Even if it's a long journey, with my legs, I can
return home within the same day--

MsgJp: 覚者さんも何か言われなかったかい
MsgEn: Did the Arisen not say something as well, my Lord?

MsgJp:
遺跡に近寄るなー、災いがふりかかるぞー
――とかさ
MsgEn:
Don't get too close to the ruins, disaster will
strike.
Or so they say...

MsgJp:
来てくれたのか！
覚者さんの顔を見たら、何だかほっとしたよ
MsgEn:
You came! When I saw the face of the Arisen I
felt relieved for some reason.

MsgJp:
ダナが精鋭の戦士を出してくれたらしい
あの渦の真下の辺りに向かったんだろう
偉そうな奴らが多い村だと思ってたけど
意外と頼りになるんだな
MsgEn:
It seems that Dana sent out elite soldiers.
They must have headed towards the area right
below that vortex.
I thought this village was full of arrogant
people, but they unexpectedly turned out to be
dependable.

MsgJp:
今は遠出する気にならないよ
できるだけ家族の近くにいたい
万が一の時に、傍にいたいからさ
MsgEn:
Right now, I don't feel like going far away.
I want to be close to my family as much as
possible.
In case something happens, I want to be by their
side.

MsgJp:
アデリンは――
こんな時でも物見台か
後で迎えに行ってやらないと
MsgEn:
Adelin, even in times like these, you're still at
the observatory, huh? I'll have to go pick you up
later.

MsgJp: ――なんでしょう？
MsgEn: ...What is it?

MsgJp:
遺跡に近づこうなんて思わないでくださいね
あなただけじゃなく、村に災いが
降りかかったらどうするんです
MsgEn:
Please refrain from approaching the ruins.
Not only you, but if the village were to suffer a
disaster, what would you do?

MsgJp:
わたしはね、ビックリするようなことは
何一つ望んでないんですよ
良いことも悪いこともね
MsgEn:
You know, I don't wish for anything surprising at
all, whether it's something good or something bad.

MsgJp:
何事も無いのが一番――
だから、外から何かを持ちこまないでくださいね
MsgEn:
Nothing happening is the best of all.
So, please don't bring anything from the outside.

MsgJp:
若い時は刺激を欲しがりますけどね
何かが変わるのが良いか悪いかなんて
誰も正確に予測できませんよ
MsgEn:
When you're young, you often seek excitement, but
whether it's for better or worse, no one can
predict what will change.

MsgJp:
悪い方にいったらどうするんです
今のままで十分――
MsgEn:
What if it goes wrong? Things are fine as they
are now.

MsgJp:
ああ、怖い、どうしましょう
この気味が悪い空の色――
MsgEn:
Ah, this is scary. What should we do about this
eerie sky color?

MsgJp:
精霊竜セシリーはどうしてまだ目覚めないのかしら
フィンダムが大変なのよ！
どんな理由があったって、眠っている場合じゃないわ
MsgEn:
Why hasn't Spirit Dragon Cecily awakened yet?
Phindym is in great trouble!
No matter what the reason is, it's not the time
to be sleeping.

MsgJp:
ただ平和に暮らしていきたいだけなのに――
どうしてこんなことになるの
MsgEn:
We just want to live in peace, yet...
Why did this happen?

MsgJp:
ねぇ、前みたいに
フィンダムを助けに来てくれたんでしょう？
それとも、わたしたちをどこかへ逃がすために
来てくれたんですか？
MsgEn:
Hey, did you come to help us like you did before?
Or did you come to take us somewhere and help us
escape?

MsgJp: えっと、なぁに？
MsgEn: Um, what is it?

MsgJp: ママがあんまりよその人と話しちゃダメって――
MsgEn: Mom said I shouldn't talk to strangers...

MsgJp:
ほんとは、村の外の話を
聞かせて欲しいんだけど――
MsgEn:
I actually want you to tell me stories
from outside the village, but...

MsgJp:
ねぇ、色んな村を見てきたんでしょう？
“芯なる樹”を近くで見たことはある？
MsgEn:
Hey, have you seen many villages?
Have you ever seen the Core Tree up close?

MsgJp:
村から出ちゃいけないって言われるけど
いつか色んなところに行ってみたいの
MsgEn:
Although I'm told not to leave the village, I
still have a strong desire to explore different
places someday.

MsgJp:
大人になったら
もっと近くで“芯なる樹”を見にいけるかな――
MsgEn:
When I become an adult, I wonder if I can go see
the "Core Tree" up close...

MsgJp:
空の色が――
この色、きらい
MsgEn:
The color of the sky...
I don't like this color.

MsgJp:
“芯なる樹”はいつだってきれいだって
思ってたけど――この空の色だと
あんまりきれいに見えない――
MsgEn:
I always thought the "Core Tree" was beautiful,
but the sky's color doesn't make it look as
pretty.

MsgJp:
空の渦、怖いのに
一度見始めるとずっと見ちゃうの
それでもっと怖くなるから――
もう見たくない
MsgEn:
I'm scared of the swirling vortex, but once I
start watching, I can't stop.
And that makes it even scarier – I don't want to
see it anymore.

MsgJp:
空はまた元に戻る？
はやく戻ってくれないと、怖い夢を見そう
MsgEn:
Will the sky return to normal? It needs to come
back soon, or I'll have nightmares.

MsgJp:
塔の外からお越しとは――
用があるならお聞きしましょう
MsgEn:
You've come from outside the tower? If you have
business, I'll be happy to listen.

MsgJp:
宿泊をご希望なら<VAL PRICE_INN>です
ここは資源が限られていることもあり
旅人に大盤振る舞いというのはできないのです
それでも、よろしいですか？
MsgEn:
If you're looking for accommodation, it's <VAL
PRICE_INN>. We have limited resources here, so we
can't afford to be extravagant with travelers. Is
that acceptable to you?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
今は寝床に余裕があります
休みたいなら案内しましょうか？
MsgEn:
There's plenty of room for a bed now. If you want
to rest, shall I show you the way?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》には
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>いただきますよ
なにぶん、物資も限られていますからね
治療をお望みですか？
MsgEn:
For the "Treat Weakness," the cost is <VAL
PRICE_WEAK>. We have limited supplies, you see. Do
you wish to receive treatment?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
弱化にはなっていませんよ
気のせい、ということです
よろしいですね
MsgEn:
You haven't been weakened, you know.
It's just your imagination. Alright then,
understood?

MsgJp:
どうして塔に住んでいるのか、ですか？
我らは守っているのです
この塔に住むことで――
MsgEn:
Why do we live in the tower?
We are here to protect it.
By living in this tower...

MsgJp:
何を守っているのかは――
長老のベレナスにでもお聞きください
我らは祖先より代々、この塔にて“守る”ために
ここにいると聞かされています
MsgEn:
What we are protecting, you should ask Elder
Berenas about it.
We have been told that we are here, generation
after generation, to "protect" this tower.

MsgJp:
きっとダナの住人たちは
彼らの武勇が村を守っていると
思っているでしょうね
MsgEn:
I'm sure the people of Dana think their bravery
is protecting the village.

MsgJp:
私に言わせれば、ダナの侵食が
比較的ゆるやかなのは
村の位置が関係しているだけです
MsgEn:
In my opinion, the relatively slow spread of
corruption in Dana is solely due to the village's
location.

MsgJp:
この場は私が取りまとめていますが
この《イヴァノスの塔》の成り立ちについては
長老のベレナスに聞いてください
MsgEn:
I'm managing this place, but please ask Elder
Berenas about the history of the Tower of Ivannos.

MsgJp:
彼が素直に話すとは思えませんが――
私たちですら、いつも煙に巻かれるのです
MsgEn:
I don't think he'll speak candidly, but even we
often get confused.

MsgJp: よぉ、買い物か？
MsgEn: Hey, are you here for shopping?

MsgJp:
ここの売り物も、皆で必死に集めてきたものだ
無駄遣いはするなよ
MsgEn:
The things being sold here are also items that
we've desperately gathered together.
Don't waste them, okay?

MsgJp:
外から来たところ悪いが、節約に協力してくれ
回復薬を次々に飲むより
仲間に回復してもらうようにするとか――
MsgEn:
I know you've come from the outside, but please
cooperate with our efforts to save resources.
Instead of consuming healing potions one after
another, consider having your companions heal you.

MsgJp:
回復薬一つ仕入れるのに
どれだけ苦労してるか――
MsgEn:
You have no idea how hard it is to get one bottle
of healing potion...

MsgJp: あら？　なになに？
MsgEn: What? What, what?

MsgJp:
最近の皆、表情が固まっちゃってるわぁ――
なるようにしかならないんだから
考えても無駄無駄～
MsgEn:
Everyone seems to have stiff expressions these
days.
Well, there's no use in worrying when things will
turn out how they will.

MsgJp:
なるようにしかならないし
逆に、なんだってなんとかなるのよ
どうしてかはわからないけど、きっとそうよ～
MsgEn:
It will turn out the way it's meant to be,
On the contrary, anything can be overcome somehow.
I don't know why, but surely that's how it is~

MsgJp:
あ、アナタにも眉間のシワが移っちゃってるわよ！
――なんちゃって、信じた？
MsgEn:
Ah, even you have wrinkles between your brows now!
Just kidding, did you believe me?

MsgJp:
これはこれは――
異なる竜に仕える方――
MsgEn:
Oh my, oh my――
One who serves a different dragon――

MsgJp:
この拠点の者は元々“塔を守る一族”――
知らず知らずの内に祖先の教えを受け継いでおる
MsgEn:
The people in this base are originally from the
"family that protects the tower."
Unknowingly, they've inherited the teachings of
their ancestors.

MsgJp: “芯なる樹”のなりたちをお聞きになりたいと？
MsgEn:
You want to hear about the origin of the Core
Tree?

MsgJp:
この辺りの者は皆、子供の頃に聞かされる
たとえ話――その中に実は――
MsgEn:
All the people around here are told a childhood
fable—a story that, unbeknownst to them, holds a
deeper truth.

MsgJp:
いや、異なる竜に仕える方にお話しすることでも
ありませんな――
MsgEn:
No, there's no need to talk to the one who serves
a different dragon. That's not it.

MsgJp:
幼い頃に親に聞かされる昔話、たとえ話――
いつまでも記憶の奥底に眠り続け
決して忘れ去られることの無いそれら――
真実が眠るにふさわしいでしょう
MsgEn:
The bedtime stories and allegories told to us by
our parents when we were young, they continue to
slumber deep in the depths of our memories.
Never to be forgotten, they are deserving of the
truths that lie within.
Until eternity.

MsgJp: やぁ、調子はどうだい
MsgEn: Hello, how are you doing?

MsgJp:
グリンデュアにはよく行くよ
この辺りでは満足に資材を集められんからな
MsgEn:
I often go to Glyndwr.
Around here, it's hard to gather materials
satisfactorily.

MsgJp:
――ちょっと頭が固い奴は多いけど
それはうちも同じだな
MsgEn:
-There are quite a few stubborn people, but
that's the same with us too.

MsgJp:
俺やダレンが集めてきた資材は
ギルロイが管理してくれている
欲しい物があれば彼に言ってくれ
MsgEn:
The materials that I and Darren have gathered are
being managed by Gilroy.
If you want something, please let him know.

MsgJp:
――次に資材を集めに行く時に
欲しいものがあれば俺が取りまとめるんだが
アンタは自由に外に出られるもんな
MsgEn:
- When we go to gather materials next time, if
there's anything you want, I'll handle it for you.
Are you able to go outside freely?

MsgJp:
しかめっ面になっている者が多いだろう？
外の空気を吸ってみればいいのにな
MsgEn:
There are probably many people with frowns,
aren't there?
They should try taking a breath of fresh air
outside.

MsgJp:
よっ、調子どう？
外に行く準備するなら、手伝うよ
MsgEn:
Hey, how are you? If you're preparing to go
outside, I'll help you get ready.

MsgJp:
ライアムの仕事を手伝ってるんで
時々外の拠点に行くんだ
資材調達のついでにちょっと寄り道したりね
MsgEn:
I'm assisting Lyam with his work, so sometimes I
go to other locations.
I might make a little detour while procuring
materials.

MsgJp:
外のことを知るって気持ちいいもんだよ
気分転換になるし、何より楽しい
MsgEn:
It feels great to know about the outside world.
It's refreshing and above all, enjoyable.

MsgJp:
取引に行くのは主にグリンデュアだけど
ダナの方に行くこともあるんだ
MsgEn:
The trade missions are mainly handled by Glyndwr,
but we also go to Dana's side sometimes.

MsgJp:
ムキムキした人が多くて
なんていうか文化の違いを感じるよ
MsgEn:
There are many muscular people here, and it feels
like there are cultural differences.

MsgJp: ああ、レスタニアの覚者様でしたか――
MsgEn: Ah, so you are the Ser Arisen of Lestania――

MsgJp:
最近は侵食がフィンダム全体に
拡がっているそうですね
――ここに閉じこもるばかりでいいのかしら
MsgEn:
It seems that the corruption is spreading
throughout Phindym. Is it okay to just stay holed
up here?

MsgJp:
ここに閉じこもって、一体何を成しているのか
疑問に思うこともあるんです――
でも、塔を守ることも大切だし――
MsgEn:
Sometimes, I wonder what we're accomplishing by
staying here, but protecting the tower is
important too.

MsgJp:
この塔をお掃除して、きれいにして――
でも、外の大地はどんどん穢れて
いっているんでしょう？
MsgEn:
You're cleaning and beautifying this tower, but I
wonder if the outside world is getting more
corrupted?

MsgJp:
ラスニテ一帯で困りごとか？
この辺りのことなら俺が相談に乗ろう
MsgEn:
Are you having trouble in the Rathnite Foothills?
If it's about this area, let me listen to your
concerns.

MsgJp:
ん、誰だお前は？
見ない顔だ――
どこから来たのか明らかにしてもらおうか
MsgEn:
Hmm, who are you? You're not someone I know.
Let's find out where you came from.

MsgJp:
何だ、聞きたいことでもあるのか？
ラスニテ一帯について
俺のところに入ってきている情報なら
いくらでも話してやろう
MsgEn:
What's wrong?
Do you have something you want to ask about the
Rathnite area?
If it's information that has come to me, I can
tell you as much as you want.

MsgJp:
どうした？　様子を見に来てくれたのか？
せっかくだ、少し休んでいくといい
MsgEn:
What's the matter? Did you come to check on me?
Since you're here, it would be nice to take a
little break.

MsgJp:
それにしても、お前もなぜ
ラスニテ山麓に立ち寄ろうと思ったんだ？
これと言って珍しいものも無い場所だろう
力になってもらえるのはありがたいが――
MsgEn:
But why did you also decide to stop by at the
Rathnite Foothills?
It's not a particularly unusual place.
While it's appreciated that you're willing to
help, it's quite unexpected for us.

MsgJp:
この状況で、疲れ切った者に
さらに無理をしろとは――俺は言えん――
動ける人間で動かねばならん
MsgEn:
To ask someone who's already exhausted in this
situation to push even further – I can't say that.
The ones who can move must move.

MsgJp:
せっかくだ、休息は十分取っていってくれ
魔物の襲撃を受けでもすれば
即座に叩き起こすから安心しろ
MsgEn:
Take your time and get plenty of rest.
If the monsters attack, I'll wake you up
immediately, so don't worry.

MsgJp:
悪しき竜、武装をはじめたオークども――
もはや手遅れであることは変わらんが
MsgEn: Evil dragons, armed orcs – it's too late, but...

MsgJp:
手慣らしができる場所ぐらいは教えてやろう
この村を出た川の向こう岸だ
MsgEn:
I will tell you at least a place where you can
get some practice.
It's on the other side of the river, just outside
this village.

MsgJp:
ああ、ここの設備は自由に使っていいが
外に出る時は注意しろよ
MsgEn:
Ah, you are free to use the facilities here, but
please be careful when going outside.

MsgJp:
――こんな状況だ
満足に支援品も出せんのだ
まぁ、無いよりはマシだろう
MsgEn:
-This is the situation we're in.
We can't even provide support goods properly.
Well, I guess it's better than nothing.

MsgJp:
そうだ、これを持っていけ
お前のお陰で、ここら辺でも
少しはマシな支援品が用意できるようになったぞ
MsgEn:
Oh, right, take this with you.
Thanks to you, we've been able to prepare
slightly better supplies around here.

MsgJp:
よく来てくれた！
お前に渡そうと思って取っておいた物だ
――これくらいの支援品は出せるくらい
状況は好転したということだ
MsgEn:
Welcome! I've kept something to give to you.
It's support goods that I saved just for you!
I can provide this level of support now that the
conditions have improved.

MsgJp:
お前らの存在が解放軍内で話題になっている――
一部の兵が再び魔軍に挑み始めたぐらいだ
悪いが力を貸してやってくれ
MsgEn:
Your existence is being talked about within the
Liberation Army—
It's just that some soldiers have started
challenging the Demon Army again, that's all.
I'm sorry, but could you lend us your strength?

MsgJp:
代わりといっちゃあ何だが――
いい素材が取れる場所を教えてやろう
廃村の近くだ、少しマシなもんを
身に付けるといい
MsgEn:
Well, I suppose it's not a bad idea to have a
substitute... Let me tell you a place where you
can find good materials.
It's near an abandoned village, so you might find
something a little better to equip yourself with.

MsgJp:
おう、たったいま厄介な知らせが入った
どうやら魔軍のヤツらが不穏な動きを
始めているようだ
MsgEn:
Oh, just received some troublesome news.
It seems the Demon Army is starting to act
suspiciously.

MsgJp:
早めに叩くか、まとめて叩くか
どう動くかはお前に任せる――
手が空いたら様子を見てきてくれ
MsgEn:
Should I strike early or strike all at once?
I leave it up to you to decide how to move--
When you have some free time, please come and see
how things are going.

MsgJp:
今日はいい知らせだ
支援できるもんが増やせそうだ
なに、感謝されるほどのことでもない
MsgEn:
Today is good news.
It seems that there will be an increase in things
I can support.
Well, it's not something deserving of much
gratitude.

MsgJp:
驚いたことに
魔軍と解放軍の支配地が変わりつつある――
これが覚者の力ってやつなのか？
MsgEn:
Surprisingly, the territories controlled by the
Demon Army and the Liberation Army are changing...
Is this the power of the Arisen?

MsgJp:
エリアの西側、ダクレイム砦の付近に
地下へと続く遺跡がある――
危険だが、行く価値のある場所だ
MsgEn:
To the west of the area, near Dacreim Fortress,
there is a ruin that leads underground.
It's dangerous, but it's worth a visit.

MsgJp:
おう、いいところに来てくれた――魔軍のヤツら
ロスギルの東でも、妙な動きをみせているようだ
頃合いを見てぶっ叩きに行ってくれ
MsgEn:
Ah, you've come to a good place - those guys from
the Demon Army.
Even in the east of Rothgill, they seem to be
acting strangely.
When the time is right, please go and smack them,
hard.

MsgJp:
王子が――本当に還られるとは――
異国の覚者よ
ネド王子を助けてくれたこと、伏して感謝する！
MsgEn:
The prince... to think he would actually return.
Foreign Arisen, I bow in gratitude for saving
Prince Nedo!

MsgJp:
魔軍戦車カトブレパス――
ダクレイム砦の獣の将――
お前の力があればこの国の状況は変わるかも知れん
MsgEn:
Catoblepas, the War Tank of the Demon Army, and
the Beast Master of Dacreim Fortress.
With your power, the conditions in this country
could potentially change.

MsgJp:
おう、来たか
盗賊団のアジトから北へ進んだところに
かなり古い地下水路があるのは知っているか
MsgEn:
Hey, you finally made it.
Do you know about the pretty old underground
waterways located north of the thieves' hideout?

MsgJp:
たちの悪い魔物どもの棲みかになってるが、
価値の高いものが採れることは間違いない
行くならしっかり準備してけよ
MsgEn:
It's become the den of nasty monsters, but
there's no doubt valuable items can be found
there.
If you're going, make sure you're well-prepared.

MsgJp:
ついにこの話をする時が来たか――
この国を踏み荒らし、我が同胞たちの
命を奪ったあの憎き戦車――
MsgEn:
The time has finally come to talk about this. The
one who ravaged our country, the abominable tank
that took the lives of our fellow compatriots.

MsgJp:
お前ならヤツを打ち倒せるかも知れん
心して聞いてくれ
MsgEn:
Maybe you can defeat that creature...
Listen carefully, with all your heart.

MsgJp:
たったあれだけの戦力で
あのカトブレパスを討伐してくるとは！
なんってやつだ、お前は――！
MsgEn:
To think you would defeat Catoblepas with such a
small force!
Who are you, anyway?!

MsgJp:
破滅までの時間をどう抗うか、って状況だった
この国に、お前は再び光を齎してくれた
ありがとう、覚者よ、いつでもお前を歓迎しよう！
MsgEn:
It was a situation of how to resist the time
until destruction.
In this country, you have brought light once
again.
Thank you, Arisen. We will always welcome you!

MsgJp:
なんだ、他のミッションへエントリー中のようだな
このミッションに出撃するというなら
今エントリーしているミッションを中止してくれ
でないと受け付けられんのだ
MsgEn:
What, it seems like you're currently in the midst
of entering another mission.
If you're going to sortie on this mission, please
cancel the mission you're currently entering.
Otherwise, I won't be able to accept it.

MsgJp:
休みたいのか？　ああ、いいとも！
<VAL PRICE_INN>だよ
すまないな、色々と苦しくてさ――
MsgEn:
Do you want a break? Oh, that's fine with me!
<VAL PRICE_INN>, you know.
Sorry, I've been going through various
hardships...

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
皆疲れてるから
あまり長くは休んでもらえないが――
よかったら、少し休憩していくかい
MsgEn:
Everyone is tired, so you can't rest for too
long, but if you'd like, take a short break.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
あんたも大変みたいだな――
《弱化の治療》なら
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>だけど、いいかい
MsgEn:
It seems like you're having a tough time too,
huh? If it's "Treat Weakness," it will cost <VAL
PRICE_WEAK>. Is that alright?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
弱化してないみたいだな
――つらい気持ちは分かるぜ
身体が重く沈んで、何にもしたくなくなる
そんな時は素直に休んだ方がいい
MsgEn:
It seems like you haven't weakened, huh?
- I understand the pain you're feeling.
When your body feels heavy and you don't feel
like doing anything, it's better to honestly take
a rest.

MsgJp:
調子はどうだ？
良くはなくても、悪くなきゃいいんだが
MsgEn:
How are you feeling?
It doesn't have to be good, as long as it's not
bad.

MsgJp:
皆辛いのはわかるけど
沈んでたって仕方ないからな
MsgEn:
I understand that everyone is suffering, but
there's no point in just staying down.

MsgJp:
ほら、気持ちの持ち方ってところも
絶対あるはずだから――
せっかく生きてるんだ
前を向くふりだけでもしないと
MsgEn:
See, there should be a way to change your
perspective – you're still alive after all.
You have to at least pretend to look forward.

MsgJp:
こうして命があること自体を喜ばないと――
そう、昨日してた心配は杞憂だったってね
MsgEn:
To not rejoice in the very fact that we have
life... Yes, it turns out that the worry I had
yesterday was needless.

MsgJp:
何か欲しいものがあるの？
残念だけど、あんまり品ぞろえは
よくないわよ
MsgEn:
Is there something you want? Unfortunately, our
selection isn't very good.

MsgJp:
この状況でアレコレ欲しがる人も
居ないとは思うけど
本当に、最低限の物資しか無くてね
MsgEn:
I don't think there are people who would want
this and that in this situation, but really, we
only have the bare minimum supplies.

MsgJp:
精一杯かき集めてきてコレなのよ
いつまで持つか――
でも、ある物でどうにかするしかないわよね
MsgEn:
I have gathered everything I could, but this is
all we have.
I wonder how long it will last...
But we have no choice but to make do with what we
have.

MsgJp:
あなたも、あんまり泣き言は言わないようにして
みんな我慢してるんだから
MsgEn:
Please try not to complain too much.
Everyone is being patient, you know.

MsgJp:
なんだよ
――用も無いのにこっち見るのやめろよ
MsgEn:
What's the matter?
――Stop looking over here for no reason.

MsgJp:
こんなところに潜んで
一体何になるっていうんだ――
ここでボサッとしてる奴らの気が知れねぇ
MsgEn:
What's the point of lurking around in a place
like this?
I can't understand the mindset of these guys
loafing around here.

MsgJp:
こうしてる間にもどこかの村が
オークに襲われてるんだぜ
――やりきれねぇよ
MsgEn:
While we're here, some village somewhere is being
attacked by Orcs. I can't bear it anymore.

MsgJp:
オレはこんなところにいたくないね
逃げるか戦うか、さっさと決めちまいたい
――ハァ
MsgEn:
I don't want to be in a place like this.
I want to make a decision and either run away or
fight, quickly.
- Haah.

MsgJp:
なんだ、あんた？
わざわざ話しかけるような用でもあるのか？
MsgEn:
What is it, you?
Do you have a reason to talk to me?

MsgJp:
ここまでめちゃくちゃになったら
もう何も信じられねぇ
信じたヤツから死んでくんだからよ
MsgEn:
Once it becomes completely chaotic, I can't
believe in anything anymore.
Because death awaits those whom I believed in.

MsgJp:
あんたも命が惜しけりゃ慎重にいくことだ
俺からはそれくらいしか言うことは無いな
MsgEn:
If you value your life, you should proceed with
caution.
That's all I have to say.

MsgJp:
俺なんか、もう命くらいしか
無くして惜しいものも無いからよ
――こればっかりはな
MsgEn:
As for me, I don't really have anything left to
lose except my life – it's all I've got left.

MsgJp:
俺に何度も話しかけてどうするつもりだ？
懐に入り込んで、なけなしの金でも
毟り取るつもりか？
MsgEn:
What's the point of talking to me repeatedly?
Do you plan to get into my pocket and take even
the last bit of money I have?

MsgJp:
ふん、まぁ――
ここなら――
MsgEn:
Hmph, well...
If it's here...

MsgJp:
――もう、いつこの人生が終わるかって
これ以上何にも奪われたくないって
そんなことしか考えてなかったんだが
MsgEn:
I've been thinking only about when this life will
end, and how I don't want anything else to be
taken away from me.

MsgJp:
こうして取り戻せたものもあるし
もう少し、生きる努力をしてみても
いいのかもな
MsgEn:
There are things that can be regained like this,
so it might be worth trying a little harder to
live.
Yes.

MsgJp:
いや、でも俺は信じねえぞ
期待すると後が辛い
何が起こっても
「覚悟はできてた」って思いてぇんだ
MsgEn:
No, but I don't believe in it.
Expectations only lead to bitterness in the end.
No matter what happens, I want to think, "I was
prepared for this."

MsgJp:
昔のこと思い出しても
良いことねぇな
MsgEn:
Even when I remember the things from the past,
there's nothing good about it.

MsgJp:
――あ、はい
何でしょう
MsgEn:
- Ah, yes.
What is it?

MsgJp: 少し、疲れて――
MsgEn: A little tired...

MsgJp: 家族のことを想うと――
MsgEn: When I think about my family...

MsgJp: どうしようも、なかったんです――
MsgEn: There was nothing I could do...

MsgJp:
――ぐすっ
ああ、すみません
MsgEn:
- Sniff
Oh, I'm sorry.

MsgJp: 家族のことが頭をよぎって――
MsgEn: Thoughts of my family crossed my mind...

MsgJp:
――私も解放軍の一員なのですから
皆さんのために、何かするべきでしょうね
MsgEn:
――Since I'm also a member of the Liberation Army,
I should do something for everyone's sake.

MsgJp:
はぁ――
もう少しだけ、一人でいても良いでしょうか
MsgEn:
Sigh――
Is it alright if I stay alone for a little longer?

MsgJp:
ごめんなさい
話をするのが億劫で――
MsgEn:
I'm sorry.
It's too much of a hassle to talk...

MsgJp:
あ――
な、なんでしょう――
MsgEn:
Ah...
W-what is it...

MsgJp:
ここに匿ってもらえて、心底感謝しとります
もう、帰る家も無くなったものですから――
MsgEn:
I am deeply grateful for being able to hide here.
I no longer have a home to return to...

MsgJp:
家も、家畜も、今頃全部灰になっているでしょう
――大変な思いをして手に入れてきた財産でした
MsgEn:
The house, the livestock, they must all be turned
to ashes by now.
It was a fortune that we obtained after going
through great hardships.

MsgJp:
何よりも気がかりなのは
離ればなれになった妻のことでして――
ここに一緒にいられたら、それだけで
どんなに気が楽だったか
MsgEn:
The most worrisome thing is the separation from
my wife – it would have been so much more
